  7012 0000219A A3[5817]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7013 0000219D 06                      		push	es
  7014 0000219E 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7015 000021A2 E836FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7016                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7017 000021A5 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7018 000021A7 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7019                                  domininext:				
  7020 000021AA 07                      		pop	es
  7021 000021AB 5A                      		pop	dx
  7022 000021AC FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7023 000021AE FECE                    		dec	dh
  7024 000021B0 75D1                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7025                                  dominiret:				
  7026 000021B2 C3                      		retn
  7027                                  
  7028                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7029                                  
  7030                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7031                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7032                                  
  7033                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7034                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7035                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7036                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7037                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7038                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7039                                  ;
  7040                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7041                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7042                                  
  7043                                  
  7044                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7045 000021B3 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7046                                  fmpnext:				
  7047 000021B7 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7048 000021BB 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7049 000021BD 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7050 000021C0 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7051 000021C4 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7052                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7053                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7054                                  fmpnextfound:
  7055 000021C6 C3                      		retn
  7056                                  
  7057                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7058                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7059                                  ;fmpret:
  7060                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7061                                  
  7062                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7063                                  
  7064                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7065                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7066 000021C7 E8A100                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7067 000021CA 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7068 000021CC 8B3E[5417]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7069 000021D0 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7070                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7071 000021D5 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7072                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7073                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7074 000021D9 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7075                                  					; ffHardFile
  7076 000021DD C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7077 000021E2 A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7078 000021E5 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7079 000021E8 A1[5817]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7080 000021EB 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7081 000021EE A0[5017]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7082 000021F1 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7083                                  					; set physical number
  7084 000021F4 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7085 000021F7 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7086                                  					; set logical number
  7087 000021FA 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7088 000021FF 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7089 00002201 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7090                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7091 00002206 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7092                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7093                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7094 00002208 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7095 0000220B 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7096 0000220F 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7097 00002212 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7098 00002214 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7099 00002216 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7100 0000221A 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7101                                  					; set hidden trks
  7102 0000221D 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7103 00002221 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7104 00002225 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7105 00002229 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7106 0000222C B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7107 0000222F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7108                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7109                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7110                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7111 00002231 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7112 00002233 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7113 00002236 06                      		push	es
  7114 00002237 E80900                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7115                                  					; bx value saved.
  7116 0000223A 07                      		pop	es
  7117 0000223B 7203                    		jb	short fmpnextchain
  7118 0000223D E84000                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7119                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7120 00002240 E974FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7121                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7122                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7123                                  
  7124                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7125                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7126                                  		;retn
  7127                                  
  7128                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7129                                  
  7130                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7131                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7132                                  
  7133                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7134                                  	
  7135 00002243 57                      		push	di
  7136 00002244 53                      		push	bx
  7137 00002245 1E                      		push	ds
  7138 00002246 06                      		push	es
  7139                                  setmini_1:				
  7140 00002247 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7141 0000224B 741B                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7142 0000224D 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7143 00002251 7415                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7144 00002253 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG	partition
  7145 00002257 740F                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7146 00002259 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7147 0000225C 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7148 00002260 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7149 00002262 F9                      		stc
  7150 00002263 07                      		pop	es
  7151 00002264 1F                      		pop	ds
  7152 00002265 5B                      		pop	bx
  7153 00002266 5F                      		pop	di
  7154 00002267 C3                      		retn
  7155                                  
  7156                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7157                                  setmini_2:				
  7158 00002268 E91DFB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7159                                  
  7160                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7161                                  
  7162                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7163                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7164                                  ;
  7165                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7166                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7167                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7168                                  ;
  7169                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7170                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7171                                  ;			trash ax
  7172                                  
  7173                                  dmax_check:	
  7174 0000226B 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7175 00002270 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7176 00002272 06                      		push	es
  7177                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7178 00002273 B85804                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7179 00002276 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7180                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7181 00002278 26C606[FF03]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7182                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7183                                  					; set message flag
  7184                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7185 0000227E 07                      		pop	es
  7186                                  
  7187                                  		;;push	es
  7188                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7189                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7190                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7191                                  					; set message flag
  7192                                  		;;pop	es
  7193                                  		;
  7194                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7195                                  dmax_ok:				
  7196 0000227F C3                      		retn
  7197                                  
  7198                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7199                                  
  7200                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7201                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7202                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7203                                  ;								 
  7204                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7205                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7206                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7207                                  
  7208                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7209 00002280 56                      		push	si
  7210 00002281 53                      		push	bx
  7211 00002282 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7212                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7213 00002286 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7214 00002289 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7215                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7216 0000228B 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7217 0000228D EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7218                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7219                                  
  7220                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7221                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7222 0000228F 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7223                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7224 00002291 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7225                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7226 00002294 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7227                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7228 00002298 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7229                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7230                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7231 0000229B 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7232 0000229E 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7233 000022A2 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7234 000022A4 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7235 000022A9 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7236 000022AD 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7237 000022B2 5B                      		pop	bx
  7238 000022B3 5E                      		pop	si
  7239 000022B4 C3                      		retn
  7240                                  
  7241                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7242                                  
  7243                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7244                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7245                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7246                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7247                                  
  7248                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7249 000022B5 50                      		push	ax
  7250 000022B6 51                      		push	cx
  7251 000022B7 52                      		push	dx
  7252 000022B8 55                      		push	bp
  7253 000022B9 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7254                                  loop_clock:				
  7255 000022BB 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7256 000022BD 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7257 000022BF B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7258 000022C1 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7259                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7260                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7261                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7262 000022C3 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7263 000022C6 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7264 000022C8 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7265 000022CB 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7266 000022CD 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7267 000022D0 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7268 000022D2 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7269 000022D3 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7270                                  delay:					
  7271 000022D6 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7272 000022D8 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7273                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7274                                  
  7275                                  clock_present:				
  7276 000022DA 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7277 000022E0 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7278                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7279                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7280 000022E3 56                      		push	si
  7281 000022E4 E842F2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7282 000022E7 FA                      		cli
  7283                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7284 000022E8 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7285 000022EC FB                      		sti
  7286 000022ED 5E                      		pop	si
  7287                                  
  7288                                  no_readdate:				
  7289 000022EE 5D                      		pop	bp
  7290 000022EF 5A                      		pop	dx
  7291 000022F0 59                      		pop	cx
  7292 000022F1 58                      		pop	ax
  7293 000022F2 C3                      		retn
  7294                                  
  7295                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7296                                  
  7297                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7298                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7299                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7300                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7301                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7302                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7303                                  ;
  7304                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7305                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7306                                  ;
  7307                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7308                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7309                                  ;
  7310                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7311                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7312                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7313                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7314                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7315                                  ;
  7316                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7317                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7318                                  
  7319                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7320                                  
  7321                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7322                                  
  7323                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7324                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7325                                  			
  7326 000022F3 50                      		push	ax
  7327 000022F4 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7328 000022FA 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7329 000022FC 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7330                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7331 00002302 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7332 00002304 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7333                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7334 0000230A 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7335                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7336                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7337                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7338                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7339                                  cmosck4:				
  7340 0000230C B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7341                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7342 0000230E B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7343                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7344 00002310 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7345 00002313 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7346                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7347 00002315 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7348 00002318 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7349                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7350 0000231A 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7351 0000231C B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7352                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7353 0000231E E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7354                                  cmosck9:				
  7355 00002321 58                      		pop	ax
  7356 00002322 C3                      		retn
  7357                                  
  7358                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7359                                  
  7360                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7361                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7362                                  ;									       :
  7363                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7364                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7365                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7366                                  ;									       :
  7367                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7368                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7369                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7370                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7371                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7372                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7373                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7374                                  
  7375                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7376 00002323 9C                      		pushf
  7377 00002324 FA                      		cli
  7378 00002325 53                      		push	bx
  7379 00002326 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7380 00002327 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7381 00002329 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7382                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7383 0000232B 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7384 0000232C E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7385 0000232E 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7386 00002330 58                      		pop	ax
  7387 00002331 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7388 00002333 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7389 00002335 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7390                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7391 00002337 90                      		nop
  7392 00002338 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7393 0000233A 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7394 0000233C 5B                      		pop	bx
  7395 0000233D 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7396 0000233E E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7397 00002341 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7398                                  
  7399                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7400                                  
  7401                                  cmos_popf:				
  7402 00002342 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7403                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7404                                  
  7405                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7406                                  
  7407                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7408                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7409                                  ;									       :
  7410                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7411                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7412                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7413                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7414                                  ;									       :
  7415                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7416                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7417                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7418                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7419                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7420                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7421                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7422                                  
  7423                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7424 00002343 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7425 00002344 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7426 00002345 FA                      		cli
  7427 00002346 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7428 00002347 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7429 00002349 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7430                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7431 0000234B 90                      		nop
  7432 0000234C 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7433 0000234E E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7434 00002350 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7435 00002351 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7436 00002353 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7437 00002355 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7438                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7439 00002357 90                      		nop
  7440 00002358 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7441 0000235A 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7442 0000235B 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7443 0000235C E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7444 0000235F C3                      		retn
  7445                                  
  7446                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7447                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7448                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7449                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7450                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7451                                  
  7452                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7453                                  ;
  7454                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7455                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7456                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7457                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7458                                  
  7459                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7460                                  
  7461                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7462                                  ;
  7463                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7464                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7465                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7466                                  
  7467                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7468                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7469                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7470                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7471                                  
  7472                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7473                                  getclus:				
  7474 00002360 51                      		push	cx
  7475 00002361 57                      		push	di
  7476 00002362 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7477 00002367 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7478 00002369 48                      		dec	ax
  7479 0000236A 48                      		dec	ax
  7480 0000236B F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7481                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7482                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7483 0000236D 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7484 00002372 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7485                                  unpack:					
  7486 00002377 1E                      		push	ds
  7487 00002378 50                      		push	ax
  7488 00002379 53                      		push	bx
  7489 0000237A 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7490 0000237F 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7491 00002381 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7492 00002383 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7493                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7494 00002389 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7495 0000238B D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7496                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7497 0000238D 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7498                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7499 0000238F 52                      		push	dx
  7500 00002390 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7501 00002392 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7502 00002395 5A                      		pop	dx
  7503 00002396 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7504 00002398 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7505                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7506                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7507 0000239A 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7508 0000239E 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7509 0000239F 52                      		push	dx
  7510 000023A0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7511 000023A2 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7512 000023A5 5A                      		pop	dx
  7513                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7514 000023A6 A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7515 000023A9 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7516 000023AD 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7517                                  even_odd:				
  7518 000023B1 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7519 000023B2 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7520 000023B3 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7521 000023B5 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7522 000023B7 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7523                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7524 000023B9 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7525 000023BB D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7526 000023BD D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7527                                  havclus:				
  7528 000023BF 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7529 000023C1 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7530 000023C5 EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7531                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7532                                  
  7533                                  unpack16:				
  7534 000023C7 52                      		push	dx
  7535 000023C8 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7536 000023CA D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7537 000023CC 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7538 000023CF E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7539 000023D2 5A                      		pop	dx
  7540 000023D3 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7541                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7542                                  unpackx:				
  7543 000023D5 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7544 000023D6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7545 000023D7 1F                      		pop	ds
  7546 000023D8 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7547 000023DA 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7548 000023DD 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7549 000023DF 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7550 000023E4 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7551                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7552                                  
  7553                                  getcl2:					
  7554 000023E6 53                      		push	bx
  7555 000023E7 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7556 000023E8 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7557 000023E9 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7558 000023ED 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7559 000023F2 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7560 000023F3 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7561                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7562 000023F8 1E                      		push	ds
  7563 000023F9 0E                      		push	cs
  7564 000023FA 1F                      		pop	ds
  7565 000023FB 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7566                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7567 000023FC BD[C408]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7568                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7569                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7570 000023FF E863F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7571 00002402 1F                      		pop	ds
  7572 00002403 5B                      		pop	bx
  7573 00002404 5F                      		pop	di
  7574 00002405 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7575 00002409 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7576 0000240B D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7577 0000240D 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7578 0000240F 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7579 00002410 C3                      		retn
  7580                                  
  7581                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7582                                  
  7583                                  
  7584                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7585                                  ;
  7586                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7587                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7588                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7589                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7590                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7591                                  ;
  7592                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7593                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7594                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7595                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7596                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7597                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7598                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7599                                  
  7600                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7601                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7602 00002411 50                      		push	ax
  7603 00002412 51                      		push	cx
  7604 00002413 57                      		push	di
  7605 00002414 56                      		push	si
  7606 00002415 06                      		push	es
  7607 00002416 1E                      		push	ds
  7608 00002417 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7609 00002419 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7610 0000241E F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7611 00002420 90                      		nop
  7612                                  
  7613                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7614                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7615                                  
  7616 00002421 06                      		push	es
  7617 00002422 1E                      		push	ds
  7618 00002423 57                      		push	di
  7619 00002424 50                      		push	ax
  7620 00002425 0E                      		push	cs
  7621 00002426 1F                      		pop	ds
  7622                                  
  7623 00002427 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7624 0000242B BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7625                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7626                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7627 0000242E 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7628 0000242F E833F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7629 00002432 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7630 00002433 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7631                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7632 00002437 5F                      		pop	di
  7633 00002438 1F                      		pop	ds
  7634 00002439 07                      		pop	es
  7635 0000243A 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7636 0000243F 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7637 00002441 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7638                                  					; sector number
  7639                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7640 00002445 52                      		push	dx
  7641 00002446 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7642                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7643                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7644 0000244D 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7645 0000244F B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7646 00002452 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7647 00002456 1E                      		push	ds
  7648 00002457 07                      		pop	es
  7649 00002458 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7650 0000245A 1E                      		push	ds
  7651 0000245B 0E                      		push	cs
  7652 0000245C 1F                      		pop	ds
  7653 0000245D 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7654 0000245E BD[C408]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7655                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7656                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7657 00002461 E801F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  7658 00002464 1F                      		pop	ds
  7659 00002465 5A                      		pop	dx
  7660 00002466 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7661                                  
  7662                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7663 0000246B 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  7664 0000246C 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7665                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7666                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7667 0000246E 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7668 00002470 1F                      		pop	ds
  7669 00002471 07                      		pop	es
  7670 00002472 5E                      		pop	si
  7671 00002473 5F                      		pop	di
  7672 00002474 59                      		pop	cx
  7673 00002475 58                      		pop	ax
  7674 00002476 C3                      		retn
  7675                                  
  7676                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7677                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7678                                  
  7679                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7680                                  
  7681                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7682                                  		;db 0
  7683                                  
  7684                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  7685                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7686                                  
  7687                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  7688 00002477 00<rep 9h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7689                                  %endif
  7690                                  
  7691                                  ;align 16
  7692                                  
  7693                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7694                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7695                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7696                                  
  7697                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  7698                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7699                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  7700                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  7701                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  7702                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7703                                  
  7704                                  ;============================================================================
  7705                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  7706                                  ;============================================================================
  7707                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7708                                  
  7709                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  7710                                  
  7711                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7712                                   
  7713                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7714                                  
  7715                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7716                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7717                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7718                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7719                                  
  7720                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7721 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7722 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7723                                  
  7724                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7725                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7726                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7727                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7728                                  
  7729                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7730                                  
  7731                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7732                                  
  7733                                  ;************************************************************************
  7734                                  ;*									*
  7735                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7736                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7737                                  ;*									*
  7738                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7739                                  ;*									*
  7740                                  ;************************************************************************
  7741                                  
  7742                                  _seg_reinit:
  7743 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7744                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7745                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7746 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7747 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7748                                  
  7749                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  7750 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7751 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7752 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7753 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7754 00000042 CB                      		retf
  7755                                  
  7756                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7757                                  
  7758                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7759                                  
  7760                                  ;************************************************************************
  7761                                  ;*									*
  7762                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7763                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7764                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7765                                  ;*									*
  7766                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7767                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7768                                  ;*									*
  7769                                  ;************************************************************************
  7770                                  
  7771                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7772 00000043 56                      		push	si
  7773 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  7774 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  7775 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  7776 00000047 57                      		push	di
  7777 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  7778 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  7779 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  7780 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  7781 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7782 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7783                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7784                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7785 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7786 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7787 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7788 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7789 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7790 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7791 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7792 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7793 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  7794 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  7795                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7796 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  7797                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  7798                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  7799 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7800                                  
  7801                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  7802                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  7803                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  7804                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  7805                                  ;
  7806                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  7807                                  ;
  7808                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  7809                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  7810                                  ;	  it has been used.
  7811                                  ;
  7812                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  7813                                  
  7814                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  7815 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  7816 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  7817 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7818 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  7819                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  7820                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  7821 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  7822 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  7823                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  7824                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  7825 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7826 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  7827 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  7828 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  7829 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  7830 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  7831 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  7832 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7833 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  7834 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  7835                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7836 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  7837                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  7838 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  7839 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7840                                  already_got_ah_status:
  7841                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  7842                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7843                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  7844 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7845                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7846 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  7847 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  7848                                  					; mark operation complete
  7849 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  7850 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  7851 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  7852 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  7853 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  7854 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  7855 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  7856 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  7857 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  7858 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  7859                                  	
  7860                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  7861                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  7862                                  bc_retf:
  7863 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  7864                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7865                                  
  7866                                  command_error:				
  7867 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  7868 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  7869                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7870                                  ; 01/05/2019
  7871                                  
  7872                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7873                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  7874                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  7875                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  7876                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  7877                                  ; high.
  7878                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7879                                  
  7880                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  7881                                  
  7882                                  		; 15/10/2022
  7883                                  
  7884 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  7885                                  
  7886 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  7887                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  7888                                  		
  7889                                  
  7890                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7891                                  
  7892                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  7893                                  
  7894                                  bc_cmderr:				
  7895 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7896                                  					; unknown command error
  7897                                  
  7898                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7899                                  
  7900                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  7901                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  7902                                  
  7903                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  7904                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  7905                                  
  7906                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  7907                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7908                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7909 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  7910 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  7911                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  7912 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  7913 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  7914 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  7915                                  
  7916                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7917                                  
  7918                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  7919                                  
  7920                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7921                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  7922                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7923                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7924                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7925                                  
  7926                                  ; 30/04/2019
  7927                                  
  7928                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  7929                                  
  7930                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  7931                                  
  7932                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  7933                                  
  7934                                  ;************************************************************************
  7935                                  ;*									*
  7936                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  7937                                  ;*									*
  7938                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  7939                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  7940                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  7941                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  7942                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  7943                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  7944                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  7945                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  7946                                  ;*									*
  7947                                  ;************************************************************************
  7948                                  
  7949                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7950                                  		;db 0
  7951                                  
  7952                                  		; 13/12/202
  7953 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  7954                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  7955 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  7956                                  					; 00 init
  7957 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  7958 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  7959 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7960                                  					; 03
  7961 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  7962                                  					; 04
  7963 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  7964                                  					; 05
  7965 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  7966 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  7967                                  					; 07
  7968 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  7969                                  					; 08
  7970 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  7971 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  7972                                  con_table_end:
  7973 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  7974                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  7975 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  7976 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7977 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7978 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  7979 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  7980                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  7981 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  7982                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  7983 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  7984 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  7985 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  7986 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  7987 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  7988 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  7989 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  7990 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  7991 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  7992 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  7993 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  7994 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  7995 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  7996 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  7997 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  7998 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  7999 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8000 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8001 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8002 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8003                                  prn_table_end:
  8004 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8005                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8006 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8007 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8008 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8009 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8010 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8011 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8012 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8013 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8014 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8015 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8016 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8017                                  aux_table_end:
  8018 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8019                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8020 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8021 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8022 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8023 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8024 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8025 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8026 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8027 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8028 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8029 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8030                                  tim_table_end:
  8031                                  
  8032                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8033                                  
  8034                                  ;************************************************************************
  8035                                  ;*									*
  8036                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8037                                  ;*									*
  8038                                  ;************************************************************************
  8039                                  
  8040                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8041                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8042 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8043                                  con_loop:				
  8044 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8045 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8046 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8047                                  con_exit:				
  8048 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8049 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8050                                  
  8051                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8052                                  
  8053                                  ;************************************************************************
  8054                                  ;*									*
  8055                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8056                                  ;*									*
  8057                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8058                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8059                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8060                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8061                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8062                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8063                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8064                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8065                                  ;*									*
  8066                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8067                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8068                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8069                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8070                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8071                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8072                                  ;*									*
  8073                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8074                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8075                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8076                                  ;*									*
  8077                                  ;************************************************************************
  8078                                  
  8079                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8080                                  chrin:		
  8081 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8082 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8083 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8084 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8085 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8086 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8087 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8088 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8089 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8090 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8091 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8092 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8093                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8094                                  
  8095                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8096                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8097                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8098                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8099                                  ;      else
  8100                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8101                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8102                                  ;      endif
  8103                                  ;    endif
  8104                                  ;  endif
  8105                                  
  8106                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8107 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8108 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8109 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8110 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8111 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8112 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8113 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8114 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8115                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8116                                  
  8117                                  not_ext:				
  8118 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8119 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8120                                  alt_save:				
  8121 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8122                                  keyret:					
  8123 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8124                                  
  8125                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8126                                  
  8127                                  ;************************************************************************
  8128                                  ;*									*
  8129                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8130                                  ;*									*
  8131                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8132                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8133                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8134                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8135                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8136                                  ;*									*
  8137                                  ;************************************************************************
  8138                                  
  8139                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8140                                  con_rdnd:				
  8141 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8142 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8143 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8144 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8145 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8146 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8147 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8148 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
