  8149 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8150                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8151 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8152                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8153 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8154 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8155 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8156 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8157                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8158                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8159                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8160                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8161 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8162 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8163 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8164                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8165                                  
  8166                                  gotchr:					
  8167 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8168 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8169 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8170 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8171 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8172                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8173                                  
  8174                                  notbrk:					
  8175 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8176 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8177 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8178 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8179                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8180                                  
  8181                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8182 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8183 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8184 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8185 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8186 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8187 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8188 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8189                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8190                                  rdexit:					
  8191 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8192 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8193                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8194                                  bc_exvec:				
  8195 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8196                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8197 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8198                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8199                                  
  8200                                  ;************************************************************************
  8201                                  ;*									*
  8202                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8203                                  ;*									*
  8204                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8205                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8206                                  ;*									*
  8207                                  ;************************************************************************
  8208                                  
  8209                                  con_writ:
  8210                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8211 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8212                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8213                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8214                                  con_lp:					
  8215 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8216 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8217 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8218                                  					; AL = character to display
  8219 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8220                                  cc_ret:					
  8221 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8222 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8223                                  
  8224                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8225                                  
  8226                                  ;************************************************************************
  8227                                  ;*									*
  8228                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8229                                  ;*									*
  8230                                  ;************************************************************************
  8231                                  
  8232                                  con_flush:
  8233 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8234                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8235 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8236 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8237                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8238                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8239                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8240 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8241 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8242 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8243                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8244 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8245                                  
  8246                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8247                                  
  8248                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8249                                  
  8250                                  ;************************************************************************
  8251                                  ;*									*
  8252                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8253                                  ;*									*
  8254                                  ;************************************************************************
  8255                                  
  8256                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8257                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8258                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8259                                  
  8260                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8261                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8262                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8263                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8264                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8265                                  ;
  8266                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8267                                  
  8268                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8269                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8270                                  
  8271                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8272                                  
  8273                                  ;************************************************************************
  8274                                  ;*									*
  8275                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8276                                  ;*									*
  8277                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8278                                  ;*									*
  8279                                  ;************************************************************************
  8280                                  
  8281                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8282 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8283                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8284                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8285                                  prn_done:
  8286 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8287 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8288                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8289                                  
  8290                                  ;************************************************************************
  8291                                  ;*									*
  8292                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8293                                  ;*									*
  8294                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8295                                  ;*									*
  8296                                  ;************************************************************************
  8297                                  
  8298                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8299                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8300 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8301                                  prn_loop:				
  8302 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8303                                  prn_out:				
  8304 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8305 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8306 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8307 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8308 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8309 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8310 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8311 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8312 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8313 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8314 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8315                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8316                                  
  8317                                  _prnwf:					
  8318 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8319 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8320                                  TestPrnError:				
  8321 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8322 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8323                                  pmessg:					
  8324 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8325                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8326                                  
  8327                                  prn_con:

  8329 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8330                                  ;prn_done:				
  8331                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8332                                  prn_done2:
  8333                                  		;clc
  8334                                  		; cf=0
  8335 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8336                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8337                                  
  8338                                  ;************************************************************************
  8339                                  ;*									*
  8340                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8341                                  ;*									*
  8342                                  ;************************************************************************
  8343                                  
  8344                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8345 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8346 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8347 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8348                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8349                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8350 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8351 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8352                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8353                                  
  8354                                  ;************************************************************************
  8355                                  ;*									*
  8356                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8357                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8358                                  ;*									*
  8359                                  ;************************************************************************
  8360                                  
  8361                                  prnstat:				
  8362 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8363                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8364                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8365                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8366                                  
  8367                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8368                                  
  8369                                  ;************************************************************************
  8370                                  ;*									*
  8371                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8372                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8373                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8374                                  ;*									*
  8375                                  ;************************************************************************
  8376                                  
  8377                                  prnop:	
  8378 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8379 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8380                                  
  8381                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8382                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8383                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8384                                  
  8385 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8386 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8387 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8388 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8389 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8390 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8391 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8392                                  
  8393                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8394                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8395                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8396                                  
  8397                                  NextTest:				
  8398 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8399                                  					; i/o error?
  8400 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8401                                  
  8402                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8403                                  
  8404 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8405                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8406 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8407 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8408 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8409                                  ret1:					
  8410 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8411                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8412                                  
  8413                                  checknotready:				
  8414 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8415 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8416 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8417                                  
  8418                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8419                                  
  8420                                  ;************************************************************************
  8421                                  ;*									*
  8422                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8423                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8424                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8425                                  ;*									*
  8426                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8427                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8428                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8429                                  ;*									*
  8430                                  ;************************************************************************
  8431                                  
  8432                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8433                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8434 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8435                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8436 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8437 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8438 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8439 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8440 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8441                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8442 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8443 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8444                                  prn_getstat:				
  8445 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8446 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8447 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8448 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8449 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8450 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8451 000002A6 26                      		es
  8452 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8453                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8454                                  					; lodsb
  8455 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8456 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8457 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8458 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8459                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8460                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8461                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8462 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8463                                  
  8464                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8465                                  
  8466                                  prn_bperr:				
  8467 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8468                                  prn_berr:				
  8469 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8470                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8471                                  
  8472                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8473                                  
  8474                                  ;************************************************************************
  8475                                  ;*									*
  8476                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8477                                  ;*									*
  8478                                  ;************************************************************************
  8479                                  
  8480                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8481                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8482                                  
  8483                                  ;********************************;*
  8484                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8485                                  ;********************************;*
  8486                                  
  8487                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8488                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8489                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8490                                  
  8491                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8492                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8493                                  ;;endstruc
  8494                                  
  8495                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8496                                  
  8497                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8498                                  
  8499                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8500                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah

  8503                                  					; ioc_pc
  8504 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8505                                  
  8506                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8507 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

  8509                                  
  8510                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8511 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8512 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8513 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8514                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8515 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8516 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8517                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8518 000002D4 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8519 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8520 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8521 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8522 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8523 000002E0 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8524                                  prngetcount:				
  8525                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8526 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8527 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8528                                  					; return current retry count
  8529                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8530                                  		; cf=0
  8531                                  		;clc
  8532 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8533                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8534

  8545                                  					; ioc_pc

  8563                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8564                                  
  8565                                  ;************************************************************************
  8566                                  ;*									*
  8567                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8568                                  ;*									*
  8569                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8570                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8571                                  ;*									*
  8572                                  ;************************************************************************
  8573                                  
  8574                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8575                                  
  8576                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8577                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8578                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8579                                  
  8580                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8581                                  
  8582                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8583                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8584                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8585                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8586                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8587                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8588                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8589                                  
  8590                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8591                                  
  8592                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8593                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8594                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8595                                  
  8596                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8597                                  
  8598                                  ;************************************************************************
  8599                                  ;*									*
  8600                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8601                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8602                                  ;*									*
  8603                                  ;************************************************************************
  8604                                  
  8605                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8606                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8607 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8608 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8609 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8610 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8611 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8612 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8613                                  aux1:					
  8614 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8615                                  					; won't return if error
  8616                                  aux2:					
  8617 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  8618 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8619                                  exvec2:					
  8620 00000319 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8621                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8622 0000031A C3                      		retn
  8623                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8624                                  
  8625                                  ;************************************************************************
  8626                                  ;*									*
  8627                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8628                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8629                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8630                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8631                                  ;*									*
  8632                                  ;************************************************************************
  8633                                  
  8634                                  auxin:					
  8635 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8636 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8637 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8638                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8639                                  		;retn
  8640                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8641 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8642                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8643                                  
  8644                                  arbad:					
  8645 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8646 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8647 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8648 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8649                                  
  8650                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8651                                  
  8652                                  ;************************************************************************
  8653                                  ;*									*
  8654                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8655                                  ;*									*
  8656                                  ;************************************************************************
  8657                                  
  8658                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  8659 0000032D E85200                  		call	getbx
  8660 00000330 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  8661 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8662 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8663 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8664 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8665 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8666 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8667 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8668 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8669 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8670                                  auxdrx:					
  8671 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8672                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8673                                  
  8674                                  auxbus:					
  8675 0000034A E979FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8676                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8677                                  
  8678                                  ;************************************************************************
  8679                                  ;*									*
  8680                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  8681                                  ;*									*
  8682                                  ;************************************************************************
  8683                                  
  8684                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h
  8685 0000034D E80A00                  		call	auxstat		; get status of	aux in ax
  8686 00000350 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  8687 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8688 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8689 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8690                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8691                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  8692                                  		;clc
  8693 00000359 C3                      		retn
  8694                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8695                                  
  8696                                  ;************************************************************************
  8697                                  ;*									*
  8698                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8699                                  ;*									*
  8700                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8701                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8702                                  ;*									*
  8703                                  ;************************************************************************
  8704                                  
  8705                                  auxstat:				
  8706 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8707                                  
  8708                                  		; fall into auxop
  8709                                  
  8710                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8711                                  
  8712                                  ;************************************************************************
  8713                                  ;*									*
  8714                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8715                                  ;*									*
  8716                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8717                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8718                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8719                                  ;*									*
  8720                                  ;************************************************************************
  8721                                  
  8722                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  8723 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8724                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8725                                  					; get port number
  8726 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8727                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8728                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8729 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8730                                  
  8731                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8732                                  
  8733                                  ;************************************************************************
  8734                                  ;*									*
  8735                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8736                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8737                                  ;*									*
  8738                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8739                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8740                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8741                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8742                                  ;*									*
  8743                                  ;************************************************************************
  8744                                  
  8745                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8746 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8747 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8748                                  					; zero out buffer
  8749                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8750                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8751                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8752 00000369 C3                      		retn
  8753                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8754                                  
  8755                                  ;************************************************************************
  8756                                  ;*									*
  8757                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8758                                  ;*									*
  8759                                  ;************************************************************************
  8760                                  
  8761                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8762                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8763 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8764                                  aux_loop:				
  8765 0000036C 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  8766                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  8767 0000036F 47                      		inc	di
  8768 00000370 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  8769 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8770 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8771 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  8772 0000037A B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  8773 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8774                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8775                                  
  8776                                  awok:					
  8777 0000037F E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  8778                                  					; still	more character to print
  8779                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8780                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8781                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8782 00000381 C3                      		retn
  8783                                  
  8784                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8785                                  
  8786                                  ;************************************************************************
  8787                                  ;*									*
  8788                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  8789                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  8790                                  ;*									*
  8791                                  ;************************************************************************
  8792                                  
  8793                                  getbx:	
  8794 00000382 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  8795                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  8796                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  8797 00000386 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  8798                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8799                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  8800 0000038A C3                      		retn
  8801                                  
  8802                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8803                                  
  8804                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8805                                  
  8806                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8807                                  ;								:
  8808                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  8809                                  ;								:
  8810                                  ;								:
  8811                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  8812                                  ;								:
  8813                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  8814                                  ;								:
  8815                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  8816                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  8817                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  8818                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  8819                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  8820                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  8821                                  ;								:
  8822                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  8823                                  ;								:
  8824                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  8825                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  8826                                  ;								:
  8827                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8828                                  
  8829                                  ; convert time to ticks
  8830                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  8831                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  8832                                  
  8833                                  ;19/07/2019
  8834                                  ;09/03/2019
  8835                                  
  8836                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  8837                                  
  8838                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  8839                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  8840                                  
  8841 0000038B B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  8842 0000038D F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  8843 0000038F B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8844 00000391 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  8845 00000393 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  8846 00000396 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  8847 00000398 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  8848 0000039A 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  8849 0000039C B064                    		mov	al, 100
  8850 0000039E F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  8851 000003A0 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  8852 000003A2 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  8853 000003A5 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  8854 000003A7 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  8855 000003A9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8856                                  
  8857                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  8858                                  
  8859 000003AC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  8860 000003AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  8861 000003AE BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  8862 000003B1 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  8863 000003B3 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  8864 000003B5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  8865 000003B6 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  8866 000003B8 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  8867 000003BA 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8868 000003BD 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  8869 000003BE BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  8870 000003C1 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  8871 000003C3 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  8872 000003C5 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8873 000003C7 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  8874 000003C9 98                      		cbw
  8875 000003CA 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  8876 000003CB F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  8877 000003CD 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  8878 000003CF CB                      		retf			; far return
  8879                                  
  8880                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8881                                  
  8882                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8883                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8884                                  
  8885                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8886                                  ;
  8887                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  8888                                  ;
  8889                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  8890                                  ;
  8891                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  8892                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  8893                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  8894                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  8895                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  8896                                  ;
  8897                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  8898                                  ;
  8899                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  8900                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  8901                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  8902                                  ;
  8903                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8904                                  
  8905                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  8906 000003D0 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  8907 000003D3 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  8908                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  8909 000003D4 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8910                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8911 000003D9 7426                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  8912 000003DB 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  8913                                  					; get binary hours
  8914                                  					; convert to bcd
  8915 000003DF FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8916                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  8917 000003E3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  8918 000003E5 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  8919 000003E9 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8920                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  8921 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  8922 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  8923 000003F3 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8924                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd
  8925 000003F7 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  8926 000003F9 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  8927 000003FB FA                      		cli
  8928 000003FC B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  8929 000003FE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8930                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  8931                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  8932                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8933 00000400 FB                      		sti
  8934                                  no_cmos_1:				
  8935 00000401 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  8936 00000405 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  8937                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8938 00000409 FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks]
  8939                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  8940                                  					; convert time to ticks
  8941                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  8942 0000040D FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  8943 0000040E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8944 00000410 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  8945                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  8946                                  					; Return: time of day set
  8947                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  8948 00000412 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  8949 00000416 FB                      		sti
  8950                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8951 00000417 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8952 0000041C 740A                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  8953 0000041E FF1E[0605]              		call	far [daycnttoday]
  8954                                  		;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  8955                                  					; convert to bcd format
  8956 00000422 FA                      		cli
  8957 00000423 B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  8958 00000425 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8959                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  8960                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  8961                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8962 00000427 FB                      		sti
  8963                                  no_cmos_2:
  8964                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8965                                  		; cf=0				
  8966                                  		;clc
  8967 00000428 C3                      		retn
  8968                                  
  8969                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8970                                  
  8971                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8972                                  
  8973                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8974                                  ; gettime reads date and time
  8975                                  ; and returns the following information:
  8976                                  ;
  8977                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
  8978                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
  8979                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
  8980                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
  8981                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
  8982                                  ;
  8983                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  8984                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  8985                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  8986                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8987                                  
  8988                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
  8989 00000429 E84E00                  		call	GetTickCnt
  8990 0000042C 8B36[F004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
  8991                                  
  8992                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
  8993                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
  8994                                  ;
  8995                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
  8996                                  ;	       ----------------
  8997                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
  8998                                  ;
  8999                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
  9000                                  ;
  9001                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
  9002                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9003                                  ;		1,193,180
  9004                                  ;
  9005                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
  9006                                  ;
  9007                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
  9008                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9009                                  ;		59,659
  9010                                  ;
  9011                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
  9012                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
  9013                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
  9014                                  ;
  9015                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
  9016                                  ; multiply by 5
  9017                                  
  9018 00000430 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
  9019 00000432 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
  9020                                  					; multiply by 5
  9021 00000434 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9022 00000436 D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
  9023 00000438 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9024 0000043A D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
  9025 0000043C 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
  9026 0000043E 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
  9027 00000440 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9028                                  
  9029                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
  9030                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
  9031                                  
  9032 00000441 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
  9033 00000444 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
  9034                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
  9035 00000446 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
  9036 00000448 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
  9037 0000044A F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
  9038                                  
  9039                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
  9040                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
  9041                                  
  9042 0000044C 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
  9043 0000044E B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		;extract 1/100's
  9044                                  
  9045                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
  9046                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
  9047                                  
  9048 00000451 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9049 00000453 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
  9050 00000456 7203                    		jb	short noadj
  9051 00000458 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
  9052                                  noadj:					
  9053 0000045B F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
  9054 0000045C 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
  9055                                  
  9056                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
  9057                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
  9058                                  
  9059 0000045E D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
  9060 00000460 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  9061 00000462 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  9062 00000464 B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
  9063 00000467 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9064 00000469 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
  9065 0000046B F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
  9066 0000046D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
  9067                                  
  9068                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
  9069                                  
  9070 0000046F 50                      		push	ax
  9071 00000470 89F0                    		mov	ax, si		; daycnt
  9072 00000472 AB                      		stosw
  9073 00000473 58                      		pop	ax
  9074 00000474 AB                      		stosw
  9075 00000475 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  9076 00000477 AB                      		stosw
  9077 00000478 F8                      		clc
  9078 00000479 C3                      		retn
  9079                                  
  9080                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9081                                  
  9082                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9083                                  
  9084                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9085                                  ;
  9086                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
  9087                                  ;
  9088                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
  9089                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
  9090                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
  9091                                  ;
  9092                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
  9093                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
  9094                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
  9095                                  ;			else
  9096                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
  9097                                  ;		}
  9098                                  ;
  9099                                  ; USES : AX
  9100                                  ;
  9101                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
  9102                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
  9103                                  ;
  9104                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9105                                  
  9106                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9107                                  GetTickCnt:	
  9108 0000047A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9109 0000047C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  9110                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  9111                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  9112                                  					; midnight
  9113                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  9114 0000047E 803E[F204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
  9115 00000483 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
  9116 00000485 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
  9117                                  					; and not flag
  9118 00000487 0106[F004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
  9119 0000048B C3                      		retn
  9120                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9121                                  
  9122                                  inc_case:				
  9123 0000048C 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9124 0000048E 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
  9125 00000490 FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
  9126                                  no_rollover:				
  9127 00000494 C3                      		retn
  9128

  9156                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9157                                  ;	disk interface routines
  9158                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9159                                  
  9160                                  ; device attribute bits:
  9161                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
  9162                                  
  9163                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
  9164                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
  9165                                  
  9166                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
  9167                                  
  9168                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
  9169                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
  9170                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
  9171                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
  9172                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
  9173                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
  9174                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
  9175                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
  9176                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
  9177                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
  9178                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
  9179                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
  9180                                  ; we reset the counter.
  9181                                  
  9182                                  accessmax	equ	5
  9183                                  
  9184                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
  9185                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
  9186                                  ;
  9187                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
  9188                                  ;   if it is 0, then
  9189                                  ;	set slow = 15
  9190                                  ;   else
  9191                                  ;	set slow = value
  9192                                  ;   ...
  9193                                  ;*********************************************
  9194                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
  9195                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
  9196                                  ;*	 use slow
  9197                                  ;*   else
  9198                                  ;*	 use fast
  9199                                  ;*********************************************
  9200                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
  9201                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
  9202                                  ;	use slow
  9203                                  ;   else
  9204                                  ;	use fast
  9205                                  ;   ...
  9206                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  9207                                  ;
  9208                                  ;
  9209                                  ;---------------------------------------
  9210                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
  9211                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
  9212                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
  9213                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
  9214                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
  9215                                  
  9216                                  ; close data segment, open Bios_Code segment
  9217                                  
  9218                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9219

  9294                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

  9296                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9297                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
  9298                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
  9299                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
  9300                                  ;
  9301                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
  9302                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9303                                  
  9304                                  SetDrive:	
  9305                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
  9306 000004CB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
  9307                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
  9308 000004CF 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
  9309 000004D3 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
  9310 000004D5 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
  9311 000004D8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
  9312 000004DB 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
  9313 000004DD F9                      		stc
  9314                                  X_SetDrv:				
  9315 000004DE C3                      		retn
  9316                                  
  9317                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9318                                  
  9319                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9320                                  
  9321                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9322                                  ; if id is f9, have a 96tpi disk else
  9323                                  ; if bit 2 is 0 then media is not removable and could not have changed
  9324                                  ;  otherwise if within 2 secs of last disk operation media could not
  9325                                  ;    have changed, otherwise dont know if media has changed
  9326                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9327                                  
  9328                                  media_chk:				; 2C7h:4EBh = 70h:2A5Bh
  9329 000004DF E8E9FF                  		call	SetDrive
  9330 000004E2 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1
  9331 000004E5 26F6452401              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
  9332                                  					; fchanged_by_format
  9333 000004EA 7416                    		jz	short WeAreNotFakingIt
  9334                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9335 000004EC 26806524FE              		and	byte [es:di+24h], 0FEh ; ~fchanged_by_format
  9336                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FEFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9337                                  					; ~fchanged_by_format ;	reset flag
  9338 000004F1 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh ; -1
  9339                                  					; Ensure that we ask the rom if media has changed
  9340 000004F6 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9341                                  					; fnon_removable
  9342 000004FB 740C                    		jz	short wehaveafloppy
  9343 000004FD BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; Indicate media changed
  9344 00000500 EB2C                    		jmp	short Media_Done ; Media_Done
  9345                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9346                                  
  9347                                  WeAreNotFakingIt:
  9348                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable			
  9349 00000502 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
  9350 00000507 7525                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9351                                  wehaveafloppy:				
  9352 00000509 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; Presume "I don't know"
  9353                                  
  9354                                  		; If we have a floppy with changeline support, we ask the ROM
  9355                                  		; to determine if media has changed. We do not perform the
  9356                                  		; 2 second check for these drives.
  9357                                  
  9358 0000050B 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; Do we	have changeline	support?
  9359 00000510 740A                    		jz	short mChk_NoChangeLine	; Brif not
  9360 00000512 E89E12                  		call	mediacheck	;  Call	into removable routine
  9361 00000515 7236                    		jb	short err_exitj
  9362 00000517 E8F613                  		call	haschange
  9363 0000051A 7512                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9364                                  mChk_NoChangeLine:
  9365                                  		; If we come here, we have a floppy with no changeline support
  9366                                  			
  9367 0000051C BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; Presume no change
  9368 0000051F A0[1E01]                		mov	al, [tim_drv]	; Last drive accessed
  9369 00000522 263A4504                		cmp	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
  9370                                  					; Is drive of last access the same?
  9371 00000526 7505                    		jnz	short Media_Unk	; No, then "i don't know"
  9372 00000528 E82800                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
  9373 0000052B EB01                    		jmp	short Media_Done

  9375

  9378                                  
  9379                                  		; SI now contains the correct value for media change.

  9386 00000537 07                      		pop	es
