 10612 00000A3A 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
 10613 00000A3C 39C8                    		cmp	ax, cx
 10614 00000A3E 7302                    		jnb	short gotmin
 10615 00000A40 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 10616                                  
 10617                                  gotmin:
 10618                                  
 10619                                  ; ax is the requested number of sectors to read
 10620                                  ; cx is the number that we can do on this track
 10621                                  					
 10622 00000A42 50                      		push	ax
 10623 00000A43 51                      		push	cx
 10624 00000A44 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 10625 00000A46 E80D00                  		call	Disk
 10626 00000A49 59                      		pop	cx
 10627 00000A4A 58                      		pop	ax
 10628                                  
 10629                                  ; cx is the number of sectors just transferred
 10630                                  
 10631 00000A4B 29C8                    		sub	ax, cx		; reduce sectors-remaining by last i/o
 10632 00000A4D D0E1                    		shl	cl, 1
 10633 00000A4F 00CF                    		add	bh, cl		; adjust transfer address
 10634 00000A51 EBC5                    		jmp	short block
 10635                                  dskerr_brdg:				
 10636 00000A53 E9EC00                  		jmp	dskerr
 10637                                  
 10638                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10639                                  
 10640                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10641                                  
 10642                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10643                                  ;perform disk i/o with retries
 10644                                  ; al = number of sectors (1-8, all on one track)
 10645                                  ; es:di point to drive parameters
 10646                                  ; xfer_seg:bx = transfer address 
 10647                                  ;		(must not cross a 64k physical boundary)
 10648                                  ; [rflag] = 2 if read, 3 if write
 10649                                  ; [verify] = 0 for normal, 1 for verify after write
 10650                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10651                                  
 10652                                  		 ; 19/10/2022
 10653                                  Disk:
 10654                                  
 10655                                  ; Check for hard disk format and
 10656                                  ; if TRUE then set max error count to 2
 10657                                  
 10658 00000A56 BD0500                  		mov	bp, 5		; MAXERR
 10659                                  					; set up retry count
 10660 00000A59 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1	;
 10661                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 10662 00000A5E 7408                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 10663 00000A60 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify ; Is this a	track verify?
 10664 00000A63 7403                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 10665 00000A65 BD0200                  		mov	bp, 2		; This is not verify so only 1 retry
 10666                                  GetRdWrInd:				
 10667 00000A68 892E[3205]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 10668 00000A6C 892E[3405]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 10669 00000A70 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 10670                                  ;retry:
 10671                                  ; 09/12/2022
 10672                                  _retry:					
 10673 00000A74 50                      		push	ax
 10674 00000A75 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 10675 00000A79 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10676 00000A7E 740B                    		jz	short disk_not_mini
 10677 00000A80 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 10678                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 10679 00000A85 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 10680 00000A87 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 10681                                  					; add hidden trks.
 10682                                  disk_not_mini:				
 10683 00000A8B D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 10684 00000A8D D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 10685 00000A8F 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 10686 00000A93 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 10687 00000A95 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 10688 00000A97 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 10689 00000A9B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 10690                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10691 00000A9F 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 10692 00000AA4 7413                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 10693                                  
 10694                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 10695                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 10696                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 10697                                  
 10698 00000AA6 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 10699 00000AAB 740A                    		jz	short do_writej
 10700 00000AAD 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 10701 00000AB0 7407                    		jz	short do_fast
 10702 00000AB2 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 10703 00000AB5 7402                    		jz	short do_fast
 10704                                  do_writej:	
 10705                                  
 10706                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 10707                                  			
 10708 00000AB7 EB56                    		jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 10709                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10710                                  
 10711                                  do_fast:				
 10712 00000AB9 E8FC00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 10713                                  
 10714                                  testerr:				
 10715 00000ABC 7295                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 10716                                  
 10717                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 10718                                  
 10719 00000ABE 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 10720 00000AC2 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10721                                  no_set:
 10722                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 10723 00000AC6 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 10724 00000ACC 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 10725                                  noverify:				
 10726 00000ACE 58                      		pop	ax
 10727                                  
 10728                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 10729                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 10730                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 10731                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 10732                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 10733                                  
 10734 00000ACF 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10735                                  					; fnon_removable
 10736 00000AD4 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 10737 00000AD6 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 10738 00000ADB 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 10739                                  its_removable:				
 10740 00000ADD 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 10741 00000AE0 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 10742 00000AE2 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 10743 00000AE6 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 10744 00000AE8 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 10745 00000AEC 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10746                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 10747 00000AF0 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 10748 00000AF2 C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 10749 00000AF7 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 10750 00000AFB FEC6                    		inc	dh
 10751 00000AFD 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 10752 00000B01 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 10753 00000B03 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10754 00000B05 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 10755                                  noxor:					
 10756 00000B09 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 10757                                  disk_ret:				
 10758 00000B0D F8                      		clc
 10759 00000B0E C3                      		retn
 10760                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10761                                  
 10762                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10763                                  
 10764                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10765                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 10766                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 10767                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10768                                  
 10769                                  do_write:				
 10770 00000B0F 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 10771 00000B13 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 10772 00000B15 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10773 00000B19 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 10774                                  
 10775                                  do_norm:				
 10776 00000B1B E87500                  		call	normspeed
 10777 00000B1E EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 10778                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10779                                  
 10780                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10781                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 10782                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10783                                  
 10784                                  doverify:				
 10785 00000B20 58                      		pop	ax
 10786 00000B21 50                      		push	ax
 10787 00000B22 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 10788 00000B24 E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 10789 00000B27 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 10790                                  
 10791                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 10792                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 10793                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 10794                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 10795                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 10796                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 10797                                  
 10798 00000B29 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 10799 00000B2C 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 10800 00000B2E FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 10801 00000B32 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 10802 00000B34 E84405                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 10803 00000B37 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 10804                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10805                                  
 10806                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 10807 00000B39 E83F05                  		call	ResetDisk
 10808 00000B3C FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 10809 00000B40 EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 10810                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10811                                  
 10812                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10813                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 10814                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 10815                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10816                                  
 10817                                  dskerr:					
 10818 00000B42 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 10819 00000B47 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 10820 00000B49 E8220D                  		call	checkio
 10821                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 10822 00000B4C 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 10823 00000B51 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 10824 00000B53 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 10825 00000B56 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 10826                                  dochkagain:				
 10827 00000B5B E8AA00                  		call	again
 10828                                  dskerr0:				
 10829 00000B5E 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 10830 00000B60 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10831                                  					; fnon_removable
 10832 00000B65 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 10833 00000B67 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 10834 00000B6A 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 10835                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 10836 00000B6C 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 10837 00000B6F 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 10838 00000B71 C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 10839                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 10840                                  dskerr1:				
 10841 00000B77 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 10842                                  		;jmp	retry
 10843                                  		; 09/12/2022
 10844 00000B78 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 10845                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10846                                  
 10847                                  write_fault_err:			
 10848 00000B7B BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 10849                                  					; for write fault error.
 10850 00000B7E EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 10851                                  
 10852                                  		; fall into harderr
 10853                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10854                                  
 10855                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 10856                                  
 10857                                  harderr:				
 10858 00000B80 E84D00                  		call	maperror
 10859                                  harderr2:				
 10860 00000B83 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 10861                                  					; force a media check through rom
 10862 00000B88 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 10863 00000B8C 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 10864                                  
 10865                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 10866                                  
 10867                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 10868                                  		; 09/12/2022
 10869 00000B90 E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 10870                                  
 10871                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10872                                  
 10873                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 10874                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 10875                                  
 10876                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10877                                  normspeed:
 10878 00000B93 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10879 00000B98 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 10880 00000B9A 06                      		push	es
 10881 00000B9B 50                      		push	ax
 10882 00000B9C A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 10883 00000B9F C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 10884 00000BA3 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10885 00000BA7 58                      		pop	ax
 10886 00000BA8 07                      		pop	es
 10887 00000BA9 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 10888 00000BAC 06                      		push	es
 10889 00000BAD C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 10890 00000BB1 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10891                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 10892 00000BB6 07                      		pop	es
 10893 00000BB7 C3                      		retn
 10894                                  
 10895                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10896                                  
 10897                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 10898                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 10899                                  
 10900                                  fastspeed:		
 10901 00000BB8 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 10902                                  					; ftoobig
 10903 00000BBD 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 10904 00000BBF 06                      		push	es
 10905 00000BC0 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 10906 00000BC4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 10907 00000BC6 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 10908 00000BCA 07                      		pop	es
 10909 00000BCB C3                      		retn
 10910                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10911                                  
 10912                                  notready:				
 10913 00000BCC F9                      		stc
 10914 00000BCD B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 10915 00000BCF C3                      		retn
 10916                                  
 10917                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10918                                  
 10919                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 10920                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 10921                                  
 10922                                  maperror:	
 10923 00000BD0 51                      		push	cx
 10924 00000BD1 06                      		push	es
 10925 00000BD2 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 10926 00000BD3 07                      		pop	es
 10927 00000BD4 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 10928 00000BD6 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 10929 00000BD9 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 10930                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 10931 00000BDC BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 10932 00000BDF F2AE                    		repne scasb
 10933                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10934 00000BE1 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 10935                                  					; get translation
 10936                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 10937                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 10938 00000BE4 07                      		pop	es
 10939 00000BE5 59                      		pop	cx
 10940 00000BE6 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 10941 00000BE7 C3                      		retn
 10942                                  
 10943                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10944                                  
 10945                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 10946                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 10947                                  
 10948                                  set_tim:		
 10949 00000BE8 50                      		push	ax
 10950 00000BE9 E88EF8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 10951                                  
 10952                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 10953                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 10954                                  
 10955 00000BEC 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 10956 00000BF0 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 10957 00000BF2 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 10958                                  		;jz	short done_set
 10959                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10960 00000BF6 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 10961                                  setaccess:				
 10962 00000BF8 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 10963 00000BFD 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 10964 00000C01 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 10965                                  done_set:				
 10966 00000C05 F8                      		clc
 10967                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 10968 00000C06 58                      		pop	ax
 10969 00000C07 C3                      		retn
 10970                                  
 10971                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10972                                  
 10973                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 10974                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 10975                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 10976                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 10977                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 10978                                  
 10979                                  again:	
 10980 00000C08 E87004                  		call	ResetDisk
 10981 00000C0B 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 10982 00000C0E 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 10983                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 10984 00000C10 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 10985 00000C11 C3                      		retn
 10986                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10987                                  
 10988                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 10989 00000C12 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 10990 00000C14 C3                      		retn
 10991

 11002                                  ;
 11003                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11004                                  ;
 11005                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11006                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11007                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11008                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11009                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11010                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11011                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11012                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 11013                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11014                                  
 11015                                  		; generic ioctl dispatch tables
 11016                                  
 11017                                  ; BIOSCODE:0C3Ch (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 11018                                  
 11019                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11020 00000C15 00                      		db 0
 11021                                  
 11022                                  ; 09/12/2022 
 11023                                  %if 0
 11024                                  
 11025                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 11026                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 11027                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	; ReadTrack
 11028                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack
 11029                                  		dw 0CA3h	 	; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11030                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11031                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11032                                  		dw 119Ah	; 66h	; GetMediaId
 11033                                  		dw 1269h	; 67h	; GetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11034                                  		dw 12C1h	; 68h	; SenseMediaType
 11035                                  
 11036                                  IoWriteJumpTable: db 7	; ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2
 11037                                  		dw 0CF3h	; 40h	; SetDeviceParameters
 11038                                  		dw 0EEFh	; 41h	; WriteTrack
 11039                                  		dw 0DC1h	; 42h	; FormatTrack
 11040                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11041                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11042                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11043                                  		dw 11D2h	; 46h	; SetMediaId
 11044                                  		dw 1280h	; 47h	; SetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11045                                  
 11046                                  %endif
 11047                                  
 11048                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11049 00000C16 09                      IoReadJumpTable: db ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2 ; 8
 11050 00000C17 [810C]                  		dw GetDeviceParameters	; 60h
 11051 00000C19 [BC0E]                  		dw ReadTrack		; 61h
 11052 00000C1B [5C0E]                  		dw VerifyTrack		; 62h
 11053 00000C1D [7D0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11054 00000C1F [7D0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc

 11098                                  ;
 11099                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11100                                  ;
 11101                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11102                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from

 11113 00000C4D 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]

 11116 00000C56 07                      		pop	es

 11383                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11384                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11385                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11386                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11387                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11388                                  ;
 11389                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11390                                  ;
 11391                                  ; output:
 11392                                  ;	for status call:
 11393                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11394                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11395                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11396                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11397                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11398                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11399                                  ;
 11400                                  ;	for format track:
 11401                                  ;		carry set if error
 11402                                  ;
 11403                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11404                                  
 11405                                  ; 16/03/2019
 11406                                  
 11407                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11408                                  FormatTrack:
 11409 00000D97 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]

 11412                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT

 11452 00000DDA 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3		; Time out error?

 11454                                  					; about	the illegal combination)
 11455 00000DDE EB67                    		jmp	short FormatFailed

 11457                                  
 11458                                  NeedToSetDasd:

 11461 00000DE4 5A                      		pop	dx

 11487                                  					;	set ES:BX to 00:00

 11553 00000E7C 8B0E[3905]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 11554                                  
 11555                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11556                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11557                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11558                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11559                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 11560                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 11561                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 11562                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 11563                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 11564                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 11565                                  		; register.
 11566                                  
 11567                                  					; Special function requested?

 11569 00000E83 7421                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 11570 00000E85 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx		; Get ax = number of trks to verify
 11571 00000E87 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11572 00000E89 752C                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #tracks > 255
 11573 00000E8B F6E1                    		mul	cl
 11574 00000E8D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11575 00000E8F 7526                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #sectors > 255	
 11576 00000E91 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax

 11578 00000E93 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+35], 1
 11579                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11580                                  					; fnon_removable

 11582                                  					; Multitrack operation = on?

 11642                                  
 11643                                  ReadWriteTrack:	
 11644                                  		; save bds pointer segment so we can use it to access
 11645                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register
 11646                                  		; assignment for accessing packets
 11647                                  		
 11648                                  		; 19/10/2022

 11651 00000ECD 26C45F13                		les	bx, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11652 00000ED1 268B4703                		mov	ax, [es:bx+3]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_CYLINDER]
 11653 00000ED5 A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax

 11656 00000EDF 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_FIRSTSECTOR]
 11657 00000EE3 268B4F07                		mov	cx, [es:bx+7]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_SECTORSTOREADWRITE]
 11658 00000EE7 26C45F09                		les	bx, [es:bx+9]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_TRANSFERADDRESS]
 11659                                  					; Get transfer address
 11660

 11662

 11664 00000EEF 07                      		pop	es
 11665                                  
 11666                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 11667                                  
 11668                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11669                                  
 11670                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11671                                  
 11672                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11673                                  ;
 11674                                  ; TrackIo:
 11675                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11676                                  ;
 11677                                  ;   input:
 11678                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11679                                  ;		  3 = write
 11680                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11681                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11682                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11683                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11684                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11685                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11686                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11687                                  ;
 11688                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11689                                  
 11690                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11691                                  		
 11692                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11693                                  TrackIo:	
 11694                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11695 00000EF0 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11696 00000EF4 E844F9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 11697 00000EF7 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11698                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 11699 00000EFC 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 11700 00000EFE 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11701 00000EFF 51                      		push	cx
 11702 00000F00 E896FA                  		call	iosetup
 11703 00000F03 59                      		pop	cx
 11704 00000F04 58                      		pop	ax
 11705                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 11706 00000F05 BE[3B05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 11707 00000F08 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11708 00000F0A D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11709 00000F0C 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11710                                  
 11711                                  		; WE WANT:
 11712                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 11713                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 11714                                  		
 11715 00000F0E BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 11716                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11717 00000F11 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 11718                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11719                                  					; good_tracklayout
 11720 00000F16 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 11721                                  		
 11722 00000F18 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 11723                                  ionextsector:				
 11724 00000F1A 51                      		push	cx
 11725 00000F1B 52                      		push	dx
 11726 00000F1C 46                      		inc	si
 11727 00000F1D 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 11728                                  					; the track table
 11729 00000F1E AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 11730 00000F1F A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 11731                                  
 11732                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 11733                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 11734                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 11735                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 11736                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 11737                                  		
 11738                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11739 00000F22 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1

 11741                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 11742 00000F27 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 11743                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11744 00000F29 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 11745                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11746                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 11747 00000F2E 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 11748 00000F30 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 11749 00000F34 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11750 00000F36 E81DFB                  		call	Disk
 11751 00000F39 5A                      		pop	dx
 11752 00000F3A 59                      		pop	cx
 11753 00000F3B F8                      		clc
 11754 00000F3C C3                      		retn
 11755                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11756                                  
 11757                                  IoRemovable:				
 11758 00000F3D AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 11759                                  					; table	and save it
 11760 00000F3E 50                      		push	ax
 11761 00000F3F 56                      		push	si
 11762 00000F40 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 11763 00000F41 50                      		push	ax
 11764 00000F42 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 11765                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 11766 00000F46 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11767 00000F4A 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 11768 00000F4D 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 11769 00000F50 58                      		pop	ax
 11770 00000F51 1F                      		pop	ds
 11771 00000F52 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 11772 00000F54 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 11773 00000F57 E8FCFA                  		call	Disk
 11774 00000F5A 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 11775                                  					; sector size
 11776 00000F5B 58                      		pop	ax
 11777 00000F5C E81D00                  		call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 11778 00000F5F 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 11779 00000F61 5A                      		pop	dx
 11780 00000F62 59                      		pop	cx
 11781 00000F63 E2B5                    		loop	ionextsector
 11782 00000F65 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11783                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 11784                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11785 00000F6A 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 11786 00000F6C E872FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 11787                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 11788                                  NoNeedDone:				
 11789 00000F6F F8                      		clc
 11790                                  NoNeedDone2:
 11791 00000F70 C3                      		retn
 11792                                  
 11793                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11794                                  
 11795                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11796                                  ;
 11797                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 11798                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 11799                                  ; are permissible.
 11800                                  ;
 11801                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 11802                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 11803                                  ; All other registers preserved
 11804                                  ;
 11805                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11806                                  
 11807                                  SectSizeToSectIndex:	
 11808 00000F71 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 11809                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 11810 00000F74 7703                    		ja	short OneK
 11811 00000F76 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 11812 00000F78 C3                      		retn
 11813                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11814                                  
 11815                                  OneK:

 11817 00000F7B C3                      		retn
 11818                                  
 11819                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11820                                  
 11821                                  
 11822                                  SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize:

 11824 00000F7E B88000                  		mov	ax, 128

 11826 00000F83 C3                      		retn

 11832                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11833                                  ;
 11834                                  ; SetDASD
 11835                                  ;
 11836                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 11837                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 11838                                  ;
 11839                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 11840                                  ;
 11841                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11842                                  
 11843                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11844                                  SetDasd:	
 11845 00000F84 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 11846                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 11847 00000F89 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 11848                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11849 00000F8B 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 11850                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11851                                  					; set_dasd_true
 11852 00000F90 744A                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 11853                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11854 00000F92 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 11855                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11856                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 11857                                  DoSetDasd:

 11859 00000F9C C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 11860 00000FA1 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 11861 00000FA3 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11862                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 11863 00000FA8 741A                    		jz	short DoSet
 11864 00000FAA 26807D2201              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11865                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 11866 00000FAF 7404                    		jz	short GotBig
 11867 00000FB1 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 11868 00000FB3 EB0F                    		jmp	short DoSet

 11870                                  
 11871                                  GotBig:					
 11872 00000FB5 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 11873 00000FB7 803E[3706]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 11874 00000FBC 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 11875                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 11876                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11877                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 11878                                  		; 18/12/2022
 11879 00000FBE 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 11880 00000FBF C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 11881                                  DoSet:					
 11882 00000FC4 1E                      		push	ds

 11885                                  
 11886 00000FCA C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 11887                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 11888                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h		
 11889                                  
 11890 00000FCE C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 11891                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11892 00000FD2 5E                      		pop	si
 11893 00000FD3 1F                      		pop	ds
 11894 00000FD4 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 11895 00000FD6 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 11896 00000FDA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 11897                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 11898                                  DasdHasBeenSet:				
 11899 00000FDC 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11900 00000FE0 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 11901 00000FE4 C3                      		retn
 11902                                  
 11903                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11904                                  
 11905                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11906                                  
 11907                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11908                                  ;
 11909                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 11910                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 11911                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 11912                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 11913                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 11914                                  ;
 11915                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 11916                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 11917                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 11918                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 11919                                  ;
 11920                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 11921                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 11922                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 11923                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 11924                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 11925                                  ;
 11926                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11927                                  
 11928                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11929                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 11930 00000FE5 51                      		push	cx
 11931 00000FE6 52                      		push	dx
 11932                                  
 11933                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 11934                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 11935                                  
 11936 00000FE7 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 11937 00000FEC 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 11938 00000FEE 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 11939 00000FF0 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11940 00000FF5 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 11941 00000FF7 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 11942                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11943                                  
 11944                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 11945 00000FF9 06                      		push	es
 11946 00000FFA 56                      		push	si
 11947 00000FFB 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 11948 00000FFF 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 11949                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 11950                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 11951 00001004 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 11952 00001008 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 11953                                  
 11954                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 11955                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 11956                                  
 11957 0000100C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11958 00001011 5E                      		pop	si
 11959 00001012 07                      		pop	es
 11960                                  
 11961                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 11962 00001013 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11963 00001017 49                      		dec	cx
 11964 00001018 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 11965 0000101B D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 11966 0000101D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 11967 0000101F 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 11968 00001021 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11969 00001025 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11970 00001029 06                      		push	es
 11971 0000102A 1E                      		push	ds
 11972 0000102B 56                      		push	si
 11973 0000102C 57                      		push	di
 11974 0000102D B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 11975 0000102F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 11976                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 11977 00001031 7233                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 11978 00001033 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 11979 00001038 7425                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 11980 0000103A 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 11981 0000103B 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 11982 0000103F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 11983                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 11984                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 11985 00001044 8936[3A06]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 11986 00001048 8C06[3C06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 11987 0000104C 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 11988                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 11989 00001050 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 11990                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 11991 00001055 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 11992 0000105A C606[3806]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11993                                  skip_disk_base_setting:			
 11994 0000105F 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 11995                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 11996 00001061 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 11997 00001064 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 11998                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11999                                  
 12000                                  FormaStatErr:
 12001                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12002 00001066 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12003                                  				
 12004 00001068 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 12005                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12006 0000106B 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12007 0000106D 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 12008 00001070 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 12009                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12010                                  		;dec	al
 12011                                  		; 18/12/2022

 12013                                  		; al = 2
 12014                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 12015                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet

 12017

 12025                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12026                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12027                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet

 12047                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12048                                  
 12049                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12050                                  ;
 12051                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12052                                  ;
 12053                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12054                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12055                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12056                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12057                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12058                                  ;
 12059                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12060                                  
 12061                                  ResetDisk:	
 12062 0000107B 50                      		push	ax
 12063 0000107C 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12064                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12065 00001081 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12066                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12067 00001083 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12068                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12069 00001088 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12070 0000108A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12071                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12072 0000108C C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12073                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12074 00001091 58                      		pop	ax
 12075 00001092 C3                      		retn

 12077                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12078                                  
 12079                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12080                                  
 12081                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12082                                  ;
 12083                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12084                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12085                                  ;
 12086                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12087                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12088                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12089                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12090                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12091                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12092                                  ;
 12093                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12094                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12095                                  ;
 12096                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12097                                  
 12098                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12099                                  ToRom:	
 12100 00001093 53                      		push	bx
 12101 00001094 56                      		push	si
 12102                                  
 12103                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12104                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12105                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12106                                  
 12107 00001095 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12108 0000109A 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12109 0000109C 50                      		push	ax
 12110 0000109D 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12111 0000109E 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12112                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12113 000010A3 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12114 000010A4 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12115                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12116 000010A8 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12117                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12118                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12119 000010AD 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12120 000010B1 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12121                                  		
 12122 000010B5 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12123 000010B8 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12124 000010BC A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12125 000010BF 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12126                                  					; Important for	format
 12127 000010C3 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12128                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12129                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12130 000010C8 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12131 000010C9 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12132 000010CB 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12133                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12134 000010D0 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12135 000010D1 58                      		pop	ax
 12136                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12137 000010D2 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12138 000010D6 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12139 000010D8 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12140 000010DC 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12141 000010E0 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12142 000010E1 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12143 000010E5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12144 000010E7 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12145 000010E8 5E                      		pop	si
 12146 000010E9 5B                      		pop	bx
 12147 000010EA C3                      		retn

 12149                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12150                                  
 12151                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12152                                  
 12153                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12154                                  
 12155                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12156                                  ;
 12157                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12158                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12159                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12160                                  ;
 12161                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12162                                  
 12163                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12164                                  ioctl_getown:
 12165 000010EB E8DDF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12166 000010EE 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12167                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12168 000010F2 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12169                                  ownloop:				
 12170 000010F6 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12171 000010FA 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12172                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12173 000010FC 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12174                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12175                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12176 00001101 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12177                                  getnextBDS:				
 12178 00001103 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12179 00001106 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12180                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12181                                  
 12182                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12183                                  ;
 12184                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12185                                  ; in al to al.
 12186                                  ;
 12187                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12188                                  
 12189                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12190                                  ioctl_setown:
 12191 00001108 E8C0F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12192 0000110B C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12193                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12194 00001110 E828F7                  		call	checksingle
 12195 00001113 C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12196                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12197                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12198                                  
 12199                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12200                                  ;
 12201                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12202                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12203                                  ;
 12204                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12205                                  
 12206                                  exitown:				
 12207 00001118 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12208                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12209 0000111A 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12210                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12211                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12212 0000111F 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12213 00001121 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12214                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12215                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12216 00001125 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12217                                  exitnomult:				
 12218 00001127 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12219 0000112B 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12220                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12221                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12222                                  		; cf=0
 12223                                  		;clc
 12224 0000112E C3                      		retn
 12225

 12227

 12229                                  
 12230                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12231                                  ;
 12232                                  ; moves the old Dpt that had been saved in TempDpt back to Dpt. this is done
 12233                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.
 12234                                  ; all registers (including flags) are preserved.
 12235                                  ;

 12238                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12239                                  RestoreOldDpt:
 12240                                  		; if we have already restored the disk base table earlier,
 12241                                  		; do not do it again.
 12242                                  	
 12243 0000112F 50                      		push	ax

 12247 00001139 08C0                    		or	al, al

 12249 0000113D 56                      		push	si

 12257 00001149 268E06[1A00]            		mov	es, [es:zeroseg]

 12259
