 14123                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14124                                  
 14125                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14126                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14127                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14128                                  ;
 14129                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14130                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14131                                  
 14132                                  mediacheck:	
 14133 000017B3 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14134 000017B6 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14135 000017B8 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14136 000017BB 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14137 000017BD E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14138 000017C0 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14139 000017C2 50                      		push	ax
 14140 000017C3 52                      		push	dx
 14141 000017C4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14142                                  					; set logical drive number
 14143 000017C8 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14144 000017CA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14145                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14146                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14147 000017CC 5A                      		pop	dx
 14148 000017CD 58                      		pop	ax
 14149 000017CE 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14150 000017D0 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14151                                  
 14152                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14153                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14154                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14155                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14156                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14157                                  ; status.
 14158                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14159 000017D3 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14160 000017D7 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14161                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14162                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14163                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14164                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14165 000017DB 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14166                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14167                                  
 14168                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14169                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14170                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14171                                  
 14172 000017DD 50                      		push	ax
 14173 000017DE 51                      		push	cx
 14174 000017DF 52                      		push	dx
 14175 000017E0 E870ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14176 000017E3 5A                      		pop	dx
 14177 000017E4 59                      		pop	cx
 14178 000017E5 58                      		pop	ax
 14179 000017E6 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14180 000017E8 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14181                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14182 000017EA 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14183                                  mediaret:				
 14184 000017EC C3                      		retn
 14185                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14186                                  
 14187                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14188                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14189                                  ; or write.
 14190                                  
 14191                                  mediadovolid:				
 14192 000017ED E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14193 000017F0 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14194 000017F2 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14195 000017F5 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14196 000017F7 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14197                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14198                                  
 14199                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14200                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14201                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14202                                  ; dos.
 14203                                  ;
 14204                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14205                                  
 14206                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14207                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14208                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14209                                  
 14210                                  checklatchio:	
 14211                                  
 14212                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14213                                  			
 14214 000017FA E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14215 000017FD 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14216                                  
 14217                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14218                                  
 14219 000017FF E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14220 00001802 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14221                                  
 14222                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14223                                  ; expensive verification.
 14224                                  
 14225 00001804 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14226 00001807 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14227 00001809 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14228 0000180C 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14229 0000180E 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14230 00001810 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14231 00001812 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14232                                  checklatchret:				
 14233 00001815 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14234                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14235 00001818 F9                      		stc
 14236 00001819 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14237                                  checkret:				
 14238 0000181A C3                      		retn
 14239                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14240                                  
 14241                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14242                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14243                                  ;
 14244                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14245                                  
 14246                                  checkfatvid:				
 14247 0000181B E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14248 0000181E 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14249 00001820 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14250                                  
 14251                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14252                                  
 14253                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14254                                  
 14255                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14256                                  
 14257                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14258                                  ;
 14259                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14260                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14261                                  ;
 14262                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14263                                  ;
 14264                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14265                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14266                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14267                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14268                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14269                                  ;
 14270                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14271                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14272                                  ; routine.)
 14273                                  ;
 14274                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14275                                  
 14276                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14277                                  check_vid:
 14278                                  
 14279                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14280                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14281                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14282                                  
 14283 00001822 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14284                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14285                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14286 00001827 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14287 00001829 E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14288 0000182C 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14289 0000182E 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14290 00001830 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14291                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14292 00001835 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14293                                  					; if not fat system
 14294 00001837 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14295 0000183A 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14296 0000183C E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14297 0000183F BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14298                                  					; definitely changed
 14299 00001842 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14300                                  
 14301 00001844 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14302                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14303 00001845 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14304                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14305                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14306                                  		;clc
 14307                                  checkfatret:				
 14308 00001848 C3                      		retn
 14309                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14310                                  
 14311                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14312                                  changed_drv:
 14313 00001849 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14314 0000184A C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14315                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14316 0000184F C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14317                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14318                                  
 14319                                  ; extended id check
 14320                                  
 14321                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14322                                  
 14323                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14324                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14325                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14326                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14327                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14328                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14329                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14330                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14331                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14332                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14333                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14334                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14335                                  ;
 14336                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14337                                  
 14338                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14339                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14340 00001850 50                      		push	ax
 14341                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14342                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14343 00001851 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14344 00001854 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14345 00001858 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14346 0000185A A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14347 0000185D 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14348 00001861 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14349 00001863 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14350                                  					; don't know
 14351 00001865 58                      		pop	ax
 14352 00001866 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14353                                  					; reset the flag
 14354                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14355                                  
 14356                                  ext_changed:				
 14357 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 14358 00001869 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14359                                  					; disk changed!
 14360                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14361                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14362                                  		;clc
 14363 0000186C EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14364                                  
 14365                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14366                                  
 14367                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14368                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14369                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14370                                  ;
 14371                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14372                                  
 14373                                  checkio:				
 14374 0000186E 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14375 00001871 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14376 00001873 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14377 00001876 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14378 00001878 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14379 0000187B 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14380 0000187D E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14381 00001880 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14382 00001882 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14383 00001884 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14384 00001886 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14385 00001887 C3                      		retn
 14386                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14387                                  
 14388                                  checkioerr:				
 14389 00001888 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14390                                  
 14391                                  checkioret:				
 14392 0000188B F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14393 0000188C E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14394                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14395                                  
 14396                                  no_error_map:				
 14397 0000188F E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14398                                  
 14399                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14400                                  
 14401                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14402                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14403                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14404                                  
 14405                                  returnvid:		
 14406 00001892 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14407                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14408 00001895 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14409 00001898 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14410 0000189A F9                      		stc
 14411 0000189B C3                      		retn
 14412                                  
 14413                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14414                                  
 14415                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14416                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14417                                  ;
 14418                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14419                                  ; **trashes si**
 14420                                  
 14421                                  media_set_vid:				
 14422 0000189C BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14423                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14424                                  
 14425                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14426                                  
 14427                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14428                                  
 14429                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14430                                  
 14431                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14432                                  vid_into_packet:
 14433 0000189F 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14434 000018A0 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14435 000018A4 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14436 000018A7 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14437 000018A9 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14438 000018AC 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14439 000018AF 1F                      		pop	ds
 14440                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14441 000018B0 C3                      		retn
 14442                                  
 14443                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14444                                  
 14445                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14446                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14447                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14448                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14449                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14450                                  ;
 14451                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14452                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14453                                  ;
 14454                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14455                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14456                                  ;		carry set
 14457                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14458                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14459                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14460                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14461                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14462                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14463                                  ;
 14464                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14465                                  
 14466                                  hidensity:
 14467                                  
 14468                                  ; check for correct drive
 14469                                  		
 14470                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14471 000018B1 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14472                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14473                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14474 000018B6 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14475                                  
 14476                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14477                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14478                                  
 14479 000018B8 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14480 000018BD 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14481                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14482                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14483 000018BF 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14484 000018C2 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14485                                  
 14486                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14487                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14488                                  
 14489 000018C4 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14490                                  					; ffOther
 14491 000018C9 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14492 000018CB 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14493                                  					; ff288
 14494 000018D0 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14495 000018D2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14496 000018D4 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14497                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14498                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14499 000018D7 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14500                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14501                                  					; 2 sides
 14502 000018DA BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14503                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14504                                  					; & head max
 14505 000018DD 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14506 000018E0 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14507                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14508                                  
 14509                                  Is720K:					
 14510 000018E3 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14511 000018E6 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14512                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14513                                  
 14514                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14515                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14516                                  		;retn
 14517                                  
 14518                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14519                                  
 14520                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14521                                  
 14522                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14523                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14524                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14525                                  ;
 14526                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14527                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14528                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14529                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14530                                  ;
 14531                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14532                                  ;
 14533                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14534                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14535                                  
 14536                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14537 000018E9 06                      		push	es
 14538 000018EA 57                      		push	di
 14539                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14540                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14541 000018EB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14542                                  
 14543                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14544                                  
 14545                                  scan_bds:				
 14546 000018EF 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14547 000018F3 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14548                                  
 14549                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14550                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14551                                  
 14552 000018F5 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14553                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14554                                  get_next_bds:				
 14555 000018F9 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14556                                  					; go to	next bds
 14557 000018FC 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14558 000018FF 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14559 00001901 5F                      		pop	di
 14560 00001902 07                      		pop	es
 14561 00001903 C3                      		retn
 14562                                  
 14563                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14564                                  
 14565                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14566                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14567                                  ;
 14568                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14569                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14570                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14571                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14572                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14573                                  
 14574                                  checkromchange:	
 14575                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14576                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14577 00001904 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14578                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14579                                  					; fchanged
 14580 00001909 C3                      		retn
 14581                                  
 14582                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14583                                  
 14584                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14585                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14586                                  ;
 14587                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14588                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14589                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14590                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14591                                  
 14592                                  resetchanged:	
 14593                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14594                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14595 0000190A 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14596                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14597                                  					; ~fchanged
 14598 0000190F C3                      		retn
 14599                                  
 14600                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14601                                  
 14602                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14603                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14604                                  ;
 14605                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14606                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14607                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14608                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14609                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14610                                  
 14611                                  haschange:
 14612                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14613                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14614 00001910 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14615                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14616                                  					; fchangeline
 14617 00001915 C3                      		retn
 14618                                  
 14619                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14620                                  
 14621                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14622                                  
 14623                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14624                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14625                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14626                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14627                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14628                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14629                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14630                                  
 14631                                  ; set_volume_id
 14632                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14633                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14634                                  ;
 14635                                  ;   on entry:
 14636                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14637                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14638                                  ;
 14639                                  ;   on exit:
 14640                                  ;	carry clear:
 14641                                  ;	   successful call
 14642                                  ;	carry set
 14643                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14644                                  
 14645                                  set_volume_id:				
 14646 00001916 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14647 00001917 50                      		push	ax
 14648 00001918 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14649 0000191B 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14650 0000191D E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14651 00001920 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14652 00001922 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14653 00001925 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14654                                  setvret:				
 14655                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14656                                  		; cf = 0
 14657                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14658 00001928 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14659 00001929 5A                      		pop	dx
 14660 0000192A C3                      		retn
 14661                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14662                                  
 14663                                  seterr:					
 14664 0000192B 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14665 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14666 0000192D C3                      		retn
 14667                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14668 0000192E 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14669                                  
 14670                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14671                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14672                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14673                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14674                                  
 14675                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14676                                  
 14677                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14678                                  
 14679                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14680                                  ;
 14681                                  ;   on entry:
 14682                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14683                                  ;
 14684                                  ;   on exit:
 14685                                  ;	carry clear
 14686                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14687                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14688                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14689                                  ;
 14690                                  ;	carry set:
 14691                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14692                                  
 14693                                  read_volume_id:
 14694 00001930 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14695 00001931 51                      		push	cx
 14696 00001932 53                      		push	bx
 14697 00001933 50                      		push	ax
 14698 00001934 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14699 00001935 57                      		push	di
 14700 00001936 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14701 00001937 07                      		pop	es
 14702 00001938 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14703 0000193B BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14704 0000193E B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14705 00001941 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14706 00001943 5F                      		pop	di
 14707 00001944 07                      		pop	es
 14708 00001945 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14709                                  					; # of fats
 14710 00001949 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14711                                  					; sectors / fat
 14712 0000194D F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14713 0000194F 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14714                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14715                                  					;
 14716                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14717                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14718 00001953 2EA3[2E19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14719                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14720                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14721 00001957 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14722                                  					; # root dir entries
 14723 0000195B B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14724 0000195D D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14725 0000195F 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14726                                  next_sec:				
 14727 00001961 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14728 00001962 2EA1[2E19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14729                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14730                                  					; get sector #
 14731 00001966 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14732                                  					; sectors / track
 14733 0000196A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14734 0000196C F7F1                    		div	cx
 14735                                  
 14736                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14737                                  
 14738 0000196E 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14739                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14740 0000196F 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14741 00001971 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14742 00001973 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14743                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14744 00001977 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14745 00001979 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14746 0000197B E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14747                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14748 0000197E 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14749 00001980 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14750 00001983 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14751                                  fvid_loop:				
 14752 00001985 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14753 00001988 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14754 0000198A 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14755 0000198D 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14756 0000198F 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14757 00001992 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14758                                  ent_loop:				
 14759 00001994 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14760 00001997 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14761 00001999 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14762 0000199A 2EFF06[2E19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14763                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14764                                  					; next sector
 14765 0000199F E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14766                                  notfound:				
 14767 000019A1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14768 000019A3 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14769                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14770                                  
 14771                                  found_vid:				
 14772 000019A5 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14773 000019A6 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14774 000019A8 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14775 000019A9 57                      		push	di
 14776 000019AA 1E                      		push	ds
 14777 000019AB 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14778 000019AC BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14779 000019AF B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14780                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14781 000019B2 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 14782 000019B4 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 14783 000019B6 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 14784 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14785 000019B9 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 14786 000019BA 07                      		pop	es
 14787                                  fvid_ret:				
 14788 000019BB 58                      		pop	ax
 14789                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14790                                  		; cf = 0
 14791                                  		;clc
 14792                                  rvidret:				
 14793 000019BC 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 14794 000019BD 59                      		pop	cx
 14795 000019BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14796 000019BF C3                      		retn
 14797                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14798                                  
 14799                                  no_vid:					
 14800 000019C0 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14801 000019C1 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 14802                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14803                                  
 14804                                  readviderr:				
 14805 000019C3 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 14806 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 14807 000019C5 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 14808                                  
 14809                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14810                                  
 14811                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14812                                  ;
 14813                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 14814                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 14815                                  
 14816                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 14817 000019C7 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14818 000019C8 56                      		push	si
 14819 000019C9 51                      		push	cx
 14820 000019CA BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14821                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14822 000019CD 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14823                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14824 000019D0 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14825 000019D3 FC                      		cld
 14826 000019D4 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14827 000019D6 59                      		pop	cx
 14828 000019D7 5E                      		pop	si
 14829 000019D8 5F                      		pop	di
 14830 000019D9 C3                      		retn
 14831                                  
 14832                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14833                                  
 14834                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 14835                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 14836                                  ;
 14837                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 14838                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 14839                                  
 14840                                  check_volume_id:	
 14841 000019DA 57                      		push	di
 14842 000019DB 51                      		push	cx
 14843 000019DC BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14844                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14845 000019DF 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14846                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14847 000019E2 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14848 000019E5 FC                      		cld
 14849 000019E6 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 14850 000019E8 59                      		pop	cx
 14851 000019E9 5F                      		pop	di
 14852 000019EA C3                      		retn
 14853                                  
 14854                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14855                                  
 14856                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14857                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 14858                                  ;
 14859                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 14860                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 14861                                  ;
 14862                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 14863                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 14864                                  ;
 14865                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 14866                                  
 14867                                  fat_check:		
 14868 000019EB 50                      		push	ax
 14869 000019EC 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 14870 000019EE A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 14871 000019F1 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 14872                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 14873 000019F5 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 14874 000019F7 4E                      		dec	si
 14875                                  okret1:					
 14876 000019F8 58                      		pop	ax
 14877 000019F9 C3                      		retn
 14878                                  
 14879                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14880                                  
 14881                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14882                                  		;times 7 db 0
 14883                                  
 14884                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 14885                                  
 14886                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14887                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 14888                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 14889                                  
 14890                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14891                                  
 14892                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14893                                  		;db 0
 14894                                  
 14895                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 14896                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 14897                                  
 14898                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 14899 000019FA 00<rep 6h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 14900                                  %endif
 14901                                  
 14902                                  ;align 16
 14903                                  
 14904                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14905                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 14906                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 14907                                  ; 13/12/2022
 14908                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 14909                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 14910                                  
 14911                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 14912

 14914                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 14915                                  ; ============================================================================
 14916                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 14919                                  ; %include sysinit5.s	; 09/12/2022

 14922                                  ;=============================================================================
 14923                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT 
 14924                                  ;=============================================================================
 14925                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14926                                  
 14927                                  section .SYSINIT vstart=0
 14928                                  
 14929                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 14930                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 14931                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14932                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 31/12/2022))
 14933                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14934                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 14935                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14936                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 14937                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14938                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit5.s -l sysinit5.lst -o SYSINIT5.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 14939                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14940                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 14941                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14942                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 14943                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 14944                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14945                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 14946                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 14947                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 14948                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 14949                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 14950                                  
 14951                                  ; 21/10/2022
 14952                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14953                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 14954                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 14955                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 14956                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14957                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 14958                                  
 14959                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 14960                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 14961                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 14962                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 14963                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 14964                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 14965                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 14966                                  ;
 14967                                  ;
 14968                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 14969                                  ;
 14970                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 14971                                  ;
 14972                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 14973                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 14974                                  ;
 14975                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 14976                                  ;
 14977                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 14978                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 14979                                  ;
 14980                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 14981                                  ;
 14982                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 14983                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 14984                                  ;value.
 14985                                  ;
 14986                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 14987                                  ;
 14988                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 14989                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 14990                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 14991                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 14992                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 14993                                  ;
 14994                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 14995                                  ;
 14996                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 14997                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 14998                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 14999                                  ;
 15000                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 15001                                  ;
 15002                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 15003                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15004                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 15005                                  ;
 15006                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 15007                                  ;
 15008                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 15009                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15010                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 15011                                  ;
 15012                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 15013                                  ;
 15014                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 15015                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 15016                                  ;
 15017                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 15018                                  ;
 15019                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 15020                                  ;
 15021                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 15022                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 15023                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 15024                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 15025                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 15026                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 15027                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 15028                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 15029                                  ;memory.
 15030                                  ;NOTES:
 15031                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 15032                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 15033                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 15034                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 15035                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 15036                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 15037                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 15038                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 15039                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 15040                                  
 15041                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15042                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 15043                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15044                                  
 15045                                  ;include version.inc
 15046                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15047                                  
 15048                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 15049                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 15050                                  
 15051                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 15052                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 15053                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 15054                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 15055                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 15056                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 15057                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 15058                                  
 15059                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 15060                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15061                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 15062                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 15063                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15064                                  
 15065                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 15066                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15067                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 15068                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 15069                                  
 15070                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 15071                                  
 15072                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 15073                                  				; currently 0.
 15074                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 15075                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 15076                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 15077                                  
 15078                                  ;      if1
 15079                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 15080                                  ;      endif
 15081                                  
 15082                                         ;******************************
 15083                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 15084                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 15085                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 15086                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 15087                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 15088                                         ;******************************
 15089                                  
 15090                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15091                                  ; device definitions
 15092                                  
 15093                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 15094                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 15095                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 15096                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 15097                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 15098                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 15099                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 15100                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 15101                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 15102                                  
 15103                                  ; The device table list has the form:
 15104                                  struc	SYSDEV
 15105 00000000 ????????                .NEXT:		resd 1		;Pointer to next device header
 15106 00000004 ????                    .ATT:		resw 1		;Attributes of the device
 15107 00000006 ????                    .STRAT:		resw 1		;Strategy entry point
 15108 00000008 ????                    .INT:		resw 1		;Interrupt entry point
 15109 0000000A ????????????????        .NAME:		resb 8		;Name of device (only first byte used for block)
 15110                                  .size:
 15111                                  endstruc
 15112                                  
 15113                                  ;Static Reguest Header
 15114                                  struc	SRHEAD
 15115 00000000 ??                      .REQLEN:	resb 1		;Length in bytes of request block
 15116 00000001 ??                      .REQUNIT:	resb 1		;Device unit number
 15117 00000002 ??                      .REQFUNC:	resb 1		;Type of request
 15118 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word
 15119 00000005 ????????????????                	resb 8		;Reserved for queue links
 15120                                  .size:
 15121                                  endstruc
 15122                                  
 15123                                  ;Status word masks
 15124                                  STERR   EQU     8000H           ;Bit 15 - Error
 15125                                  STBUI   EQU     0200H           ;Bit 9 - Buisy
 15126                                  STDON   EQU     0100H           ;Bit 8 - Done
 15127                                  STECODE EQU     00FFH           ;Error code
 15128                                  WRECODE EQU     0
 15129

 15131                                  DEVINIT EQU     0               ;Initialization

 15134                                  DMEDHL  EQU     15              ;Size of media check header
 15135                                  DEVBPB  EQU     2               ;Get BPB
 15136                                  DEVRDIOCTL EQU  3               ;IOCTL read
 15137                                  DBPBHL  EQU     22              ;Size of Get BPB header
 15138                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read
 15139                                  DRDWRHL EQU     22              ;Size of RD/WR header
 15140                                  DEVRDND EQU     5               ;Non destructive read no wait (character devs)
 15141                                  DRDNDHL EQU     14              ;Size of non destructive read header
 15142                                  DEVIST  EQU     6               ;Input status
 15143                                  DSTATHL EQU     13              ;Size of status header
 15144                                  DEVIFL  EQU     7               ;Input flush

 15153                                  struc	SYS_FCB
 15154 00000000 ??                      .fcb_drive:	resb 1
 15155 00000001 ????????????????        .fcb_name:	resb 8
 15156 00000009 ??????                  .fcb_ext:	resb 3
 15157 0000000C ????                    .fcb_EXTENT:	resw 1
 15158 0000000E ????                    .fcb_RECSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of record (user settable)
 15159 00000010 ????                    .fcb_FILSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of file in bytes; used with the following
 15160                                                          ; word
 15161 00000012 ????                    .fcb_DRVBP:	resw 1	; BP for SEARCH FIRST and SEARCH NEXT
 15162 00000014 ????                    .fcb_FDATE:	resw 1	; Date of last writing
 15163 00000016 ????                    .fcb_FTIME:	resw 1	; Time of last writing
 15164 00000018 ??                      .fcb_DEVID:	resb 1	; Device ID number, bits 0-5 if file.
 15165                                                          ; bit 7=0 for file, bit 7=1 for I/O device
 15166                                                          ; If file, bit 6=0 if dirty
 15167                                                          ; If I/O device, bit 6=0 if EOF (input)
 15168                                                          ;               Bit 5=1 if Raw mode
 15169                                                          ;               Bit 0=1 if console input device
 15170                                                          ;               Bit 1=1 if console output device
 15171                                                          ;               Bit 2=1 if null device
 15172                                                          ;               Bit 3=1 if clock device
 15173 00000019 ????                    .fcb_FIRCLUS:	resw 1	; First cluster of file
 15174 0000001B ????                    .fcb_CLUSPOS:	resw 1	; Position of last cluster accessed
 15175 0000001D ????                    .fcb_LSTCLUS:	resw 1	; Last cluster accessed and directory
 15176 0000001F ??                                   	resb 1	; pack 2 12 bit numbers into 24 bits...
 15177 00000020 ??                      .fcb_NR:	resb 1	; Next record
 15178 00000021 ????????                .fcb_RR:	resb 4	; Random record
 15179                                  .size:
 15180                                  endstruc

 15182                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15183                                  ; Field definition for I/O buffer information
 15184                                  
 15185                                  ; 22/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.0, BUFFER.INC, 1991)
 15186                                  
 15187                                  struc buffinfo
 15188 00000000 ????                    .buf_next:	resw 1	; Pointer to next buffer in list
 15189 00000002 ????                    .buf_prev:	resw 1	; Pointer to previous buffer in list
 15190 00000004 ??                      .buf_ID:	resb 1	; Drive of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 15191                                  			; SFT table index (bit 7 = 1)
 15192                                  			; = FFh if buffer free
 15193 00000005 ??                      .buf_flags:	resb 1	; Bit 7 = 1 if Remote file buffer
 15194                                  			;	= 0 if Local device buffer
 15195                                  			; Bit 6 = 1 if buffer dirty
 15196                                  			; Bit 5 = Reserved
 15197                                  			; Bit 4 = Search bit (bit 7 = 1)
 15198                                  			; Bit 3 = 1 if buffer is DATA
 15199                                  			; Bit 2 = 1 if buffer is DIR
 15200                                  			; Bit 1 = 1 if buffer is FAT
 15201                                  			; Bit 0 = Reserved
 15202 00000006 ????????                .buf_sector:	resd 1	; Sector number of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 15203                                  ; The next two items are often refed as a word (bit 7 = 0)
 15204 0000000A ??                      .buf_wrtcnt:	resb 1	; For FAT sectors, # times sector written out
 15205 0000000B ????                    .buf_wrtcntinc:	resw 1	; "   "     "   , # sectors between each write
 15206 0000000D ????????                .buf_DPB :	resd 1	; Pointer to drive parameters
 15207 00000011 ????                    .buf_fill:	resw 1	; How full buffer is (bit 7 = 1)
 15208 00000013 ??                      .buf_reserved:	resb 1	; make DWORD boundary for 386
 15209                                  .size:
 15210                                  endstruc
 15211                                  
 15212                                  %define buf_offset	dword [buf_sector]
 15213                                  			;For bit 7 = 1, this is the byte
 15214                                  			;offset of the start of the buffer in
 15215                                  			;the file pointed to by buf_ID.  Thus
 15216                                  			;the buffer starts at location
 15217                                  			;buf_offset in the file and contains
 15218                                  			;buf_fill bytes.
 15219                                  
 15220                                  bufinsiz	equ	buffinfo.size ; ; Size of structure in bytes
 15221                                  
 15222                                  
 15223                                  buf_Free	equ	0FFh		; buf_id of free buffer
 15224                                  
 15225                                  ;Flag byte masks
 15226                                  buf_isnet	EQU	10000000B
 15227                                  buf_dirty	EQU	01000000B
 15228                                  ;***
 15229                                  buf_visit	EQU	00100000B
 15230                                  ;***
 15231                                  buf_snbuf	EQU	00010000B
 15232                                  
 15233                                  buf_isDATA	EQU	00001000B
 15234                                  buf_isDIR	EQU	00000100B
 15235                                  buf_isFAT	EQU	00000010B
 15236                                  buf_type_0	EQU	11110001B	; AND sets type to "none"
 15237                                  
 15238                                  buf_NetID	EQU	bufinsiz
