 30863                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30864                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30865                                  	retn
 30866                                  
 30867                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30868                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 30869                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30870                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 30871                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 30872                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 30873                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30874                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30875                                  
 30876                                  HeadUmb:
 30877                                  	; 13/05/2019
 30878                                  
 30879                                  	;push	si ; ?
 30880                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 30881                                  	;push	es
 30882                                  	;push	bx ; *
 30883                                  
 30884                                  	; 09/04/2019
 30885                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 30886                                  
 30887                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30888                                  	int	21h
 30889                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 30890                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 30891                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 30892                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 30893                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30894                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 30895                                  
 30896                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 30897                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 30898                                  xhu_e:	
 30899                                  	;stc
 30900                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 30901                                  xhu_x:	
 30902                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 30903                                  	;pop	es	
 30904                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 30905                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 30906                                  	retn
 30907                                  
 30908                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30909                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 30910                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30911                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30912                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 30913                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30914                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 30915                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30916                                  
 30917                                  linkumb:
 30918                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 30919                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 30920                                  
 30921                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 30922                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 30923                                  
 30924                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30925                                  	mov	bx,1
 30926                                  	int	21h
 30927                                  lumbX:
 30928                                  	retn
 30929                                  
 30930                                  %endif
 30931                                  
 30932                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30933                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 30934                                  
 30935                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30936                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30937                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30938                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30939                                  
 30940                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30941                                  ;
 30942                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 30943                                  ;
 30944                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 30945                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 30946                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 30947                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 30948                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 30949                                  ;
 30950                                  ;	Output : none
 30951                                  ;
 30952                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 30953                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 30954                                  ;
 30955                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30956                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 30957                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 30958                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 30959                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 30960                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30961                                  
 30962                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30963                                  InitDevLoad:
 30964                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30965                                  	; ds = cs
 30966 00002818 803E[071F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 30967                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 30968                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 30969 0000281D 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 30970                                  
 30971                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30972                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 30973                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 30974                                  ;
 30975                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 30976                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 30977                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 30978                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 30979                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 30980                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 30981                                  ;
 30982                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 30983                                  ;
 30984                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 30985                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 30986                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 30987                                  ;	pushf
 30988                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 30989                                  ;	popf
 30990                                  ;
 30991                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 30992                                  ;
 30993                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 30994                                  
 30995                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30996                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 30997                                  InitForConv:
 30998                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30999                                  	; ds = cs
 31000 0000281F E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31001                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31002 00002822 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31003 00002824 E85004                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31004 00002827 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31005 0000282A 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31006                                  					;  in low memory
 31007                                  InitForHi:
 31008                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31009                                  	; ds = cs
 31010                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31011                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31012                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31013 0000282C A1[FD1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31014 0000282F 8B16[F91E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31015 00002833 0316[FB1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31016 00002837 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31017                                  
 31018                                  InitForLo:
 31019                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31020                                  	; ds = cs
 31021                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31022 00002839 C606[071F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31023                                  initforlo_x:
 31024                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31025                                  	; ds = cs
 31026                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31027                                  					;  we are loading low
 31028                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31029                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31030 0000283E A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31031 00002841 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31032                                  idl1:
 31033 00002845 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31034                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31035                                  	; ds = cs
 31036                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31037                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31038                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31039                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31040 00002848 A3[EC1E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31041 0000284B 8916[EE1E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31042 0000284F C706[F01E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31043 00002855 A3[F21E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31044 00002858 C3                      	retn
 31045                                  
 31046                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31047                                  ;
 31048                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31049                                  ;
 31050                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31051                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31052                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31053                                  ;		   current UMB
 31054                                  ;
 31055                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31056                                  
 31057                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31058                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31059                                  	; ds = cs
 31060                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31061                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31062                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31063 00002859 A1[FB1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31064 0000285C 0306[F91E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31065 00002860 2B06[FD1E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31066                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31067                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31068                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31069                                  	;stc
 31070                                  	;retn
 31071                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31072 00002864 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31073 00002867 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31074                                  spcinumb1:
 31075 00002869 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31076                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31077                                  	; ds = cs
 31078 0000286A 3B06[EA1E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31079                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31080                                  spcinumb2:
 31081 0000286E C3                      	retn
 31082                                  
 31083                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31084                                  ;
 31085                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31086                                  ;
 31087                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31088                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31089                                  ;
 31090                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31091                                  
 31092                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31093                                  ;
 31094                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31095                                  ;	push	ds
 31096                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31097                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31098                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31099                                  ;	pop	ds
 31100                                  ;
 31101                                  ;	inc	ax
 31102                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31103                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31104                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31105                                  ;	retn
 31106                                  
 31107                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31108                                  ;
 31109                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31110                                  ;
 31111                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31112                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31113                                  ;		 the device.
 31114                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31115                                  ;
 31116                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31117                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31118                                  ;	UMB.
 31119                                  ;
 31120                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31121                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31122                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31123                                  ;
 31124                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31125                                  
 31126                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31127                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31128                                  
 31129                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31130                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31131                                  	; ds = cs
 31132 0000286F BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31133 00002872 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31134 00002875 CD21                    	int	21h
 31135                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31136                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31137                                  
 31138 00002877 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31139 00002879 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31140                                  
 31141 0000287B 4B                      	dec	bx
 31142                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31143                                  	; ds = cs
 31144 0000287C 391E[EA1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31145                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31146 00002880 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31147 00002882 43                      	inc	bx
 31148                                  
 31149 00002883 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31150 00002886 CD21                    	int	21h
 31151 00002888 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31152                                  
 31153                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31154                                  	;dec	ax
 31155                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31156                                  	;
 31157                                  PrepareMark:
 31158 0000288A 1E                      	push	ds
 31159 0000288B 48                      	dec	ax
 31160 0000288C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31161 0000288E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31162 00002894 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31163 0000289A 40                      	inc	ax
 31164 0000289B 1F                      	pop	ds
 31165                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31166                                  	; ds = cs
 31167                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31168                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31169                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax

 31171 000028A0 A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31172 000028A3 A3[FD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31173                                  	;
 31174                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31175                                  	; cf=0
 31176                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31177 000028A6 C3                      	retn
 31178                                  gufd_err:
 31179 000028A7 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31180                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31181                                  	; ds = cs
 31182                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31183                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31184                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax

 31189 000028B3 C3                      	retn

 31191                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31192                                  ;
 31193                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31194                                  ;
 31195                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31196                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31197                                  ;
 31198                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31199                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31200                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31201                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31202                                  ;
 31203                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31204                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31205                                  ;
 31206                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31207                                  
 31208                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31209                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31210

 31213 000028B5 57                      	push	di
 31214 000028B6 1E                      	push	ds
 31215 000028B7 56                      	push	si
 31216 000028B8 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31217 000028BA 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31218 000028C0 40                      	inc	ax
 31219 000028C1 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31220                                  
 31221                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31222                                  
 31223 000028C5 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31224 000028C6 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31225                                  
 31226 000028CB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31227 000028CD FC                      	cld
 31228                                  dsm_again:
 31229 000028CE AC                      	lodsb
 31230 000028CF 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31231 000028D1 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31232 000028D3 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31233 000028D5 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31234                                  isit_slash:
 31235 000028D7 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31236 000028D9 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31237 000028DB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31238 000028DD EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31239                                  isit_null:
 31240 000028DF 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31241 000028E1 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31242 000028E3 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31243                                  
 31244 000028E5 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31245 000028E8 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31246                                  dsm_next_char:
 31247 000028EB AC                      	lodsb
 31248 000028EC 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31249 000028EE 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31250 000028F0 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31251 000028F2 7403                    	je	short blankout

 31253 000028F5 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31254                                  blankout:

 31257 000028FB F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31258                                  dsm_exit:

 31261 000028FF 1F                      	pop	ds
 31262 00002900 5F                      	pop	di
 31263 00002901 07                      	pop	es
 31264 00002902 C3                      	retn

 31268                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31269                                  ;
 31270                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31271                                  ;
 31272                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31273                                  ;
 31274                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31275                                  ;	in DevSize
 31276                                  ;
 31277                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31278                                  
 31279                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31280                                  SizeDevice:
 31281                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31282                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31283 00002903 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31284 00002904 06                      	push	es
 31285 00002905 1F                      	pop	ds

 31287 00002908 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31288 0000290B CD21                    	int	21h
 31289 0000290D 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31290                                  
 31291 0000290F 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31292 00002911 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31293 00002914 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31294 00002916 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31295 00002918 CD21                    	int	21h
 31296 0000291A 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31297 0000291C 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31298 0000291F 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31299 00002922 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31300 00002926 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31301 00002928 2EC706[EA1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31302                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31303 0000292F EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31304                                  szdev1:
 31305 00002931 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31306 00002933 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31307 00002935 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31308 00002937 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31309 00002939 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31310                                  	;
 31311                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31312 0000293B 2E3B06[081F]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31313 00002940 7705                    	ja      short szdev2
 31314 00002942 2EA1[081F]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31315                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31316 00002946 F8                      	clc
 31317                                  szdev2:
 31318 00002947 2EA3[EA1E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 31319                                  
 31320                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31321                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31322                                  	; cf=0
 31323                                  	;clc
 31324                                  sd_close:

 31326                                  					;  carry flag
 31327 0000294C B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close

 31329 00002951 9D                      	popf
 31330                                  sd_err:
 31331                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31332                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31333 00002952 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 31334 00002953 C3                      	retn

 31637 00002A36 EBF5                    	jmp	short sd_next_char ; 01/11/2022
 31638                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31639                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31640                                  ;sd_ret:

 31643                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31644                                  ;
 31645                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31646                                  ;
 31647                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31648                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31649                                  ;
 31650                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31651                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31652                                  ;
 31653                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31654                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31655                                  ;
 31656                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31657                                  
 31658                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31659                                  
 31660                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31661                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31662                                  GetHexNum:
 31663 00002A38 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31664 00002A3A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31665                                  ghn_next:
 31666 00002A3C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31667 00002A3F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31668 00002A42 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31669 00002A44 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31670 00002A47 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31671 00002A49 50                      	push	ax
 31672 00002A4A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31673 00002A4C E83706                  	call	delim
 31674 00002A4F 58                      	pop	ax
 31675                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31676 00002A50 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31677 00002A53 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31678 00002A55 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31679                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31680                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31681 00002A58 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31682                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31683                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31684                                  ghn_shift1:
 31685 00002A5A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31686 00002A5C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31687 00002A5E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31688 00002A60 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31689 00002A62 46                      	inc	si
 31690 00002A63 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 31691                                  ghn_into_paras:
 31692 00002A65 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 31693 00002A68 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31694 00002A6B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 31695 00002A6F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 31696                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31697                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31698                                  ghn_shift2:
 31699 00002A71 F8                      	clc
 31700 00002A72 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 31701 00002A74 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 31702 00002A76 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 31703 00002A78 F8                      	clc
 31704 00002A79 C3                      	retn
 31705                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31706                                  ghn_err:
 31707                                  gnib_err:
 31708 00002A7A F9                      	stc
 31709                                  ghn_ret:
 31710                                  gnib_ret:
 31711 00002A7B C3                      	retn

 31717                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 31718                                  ;
 31719                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 31720                                  ;

 31834                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 31835                                  ;
 31836                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 31837                                  ;
 31838                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 31839                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 31840                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 31841                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block

 31844                                  ;				CY

 31872 00002AF0 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error

 31875                                  	; 12/12/2022

 31886                                  ;
 31887                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 31888                                  ;
 31889                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 31890                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 31891                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 31892                                  ;			; DS = data
 31893                                  ;
 31894                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 31895                                  ;
 31896                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 31897                                  ;
 31898                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31899                                  
 31900                                  umb_insert:
 31901 00002AF7 1E                      	push	ds
 31902

 31910 00002B00 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 31911 00002B02 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31912                                  ui_next:
 31913 00002B04 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 31914                                  					;    new block
 31915 00002B06 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 31916                                  					; Q: is current block the
 31917                                  					;    last
 31918 00002B08 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31919 00002B0E 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 31920                                  					; N: get next block
 31921 00002B10 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 31922                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 31923 00002B12 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31924 00002B15 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 31925                                  
 31926                                  ui_insert:
 31927 00002B17 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 31928 00002B19 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 31929

 31931 00002B1C F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 31932                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 31933 00002B1E C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'

 31940

 31942                                  
 31943 00002B33 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 31944 00002B35 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'

 31946                                  					; mark as free

 31948                                  					; start & end of new block
 31949 00002B45 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 31950                                  
 31951                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 31952

 31956 00002B4F 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 31957                                  
 31958                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 31959                                  					; this block
 31960 00002B50 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 31961                                  	
 31962 00002B52 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 31963 00002B58 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31964 00002B5F 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 31965 00002B63 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 31966                                  
 31967 00002B6A EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 31968                                  
 31969                                  ui_append:

 31971 00002B6C 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 31972 00002B71 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 31973                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 31974                                  					; block for the next arena.

 31979 00002B7F 40                      	inc	ax

 31981                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 31982 00002B82 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 31983                                  
 31984 00002B84 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block

 31987 00002B8C 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned

 31989 00002B97 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 31990

 31992 00002B9E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx

 31994 00002BA6 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system

 31998                                  ui_done:

 32000 00002BB3 1F                      	pop	ds

 32006                                  
 32007                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32008                                  ;
 32009                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32010                                  ;
 32011                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32012                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32013                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32014                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32015                                  ;
 32016                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32017                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32018                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32019                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32020                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32021                                  ;
 32022                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32023                                  
 32024                                  umb_coalesce:
 32025                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32026                                  	; ds = cs
 32027 00002BB5 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32028                                  
 32029 00002BB6 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32030                                  
 32031                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32032                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32033 00002BB8 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32034 00002BBC 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32035                                  uc_nextfree:
 32036 00002BC1 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32037 00002BC3 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32038                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32039 00002BC5 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32040 00002BCA 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32041                                  					; N: get next arena
 32042 00002BCC E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32043 00002BCF 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32044 00002BD1 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32045                                  uc_again:
 32046 00002BD3 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32047 00002BD6 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32048                                  uc_check:
 32049 00002BD8 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32050 00002BDD 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32051                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32052 00002BDF 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32053 00002BE4 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32054                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32055 00002BE5 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32056 00002BE9 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32057 00002BEC 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32058 00002BEE EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32059                                  
 32060                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32061                                  ;uc_done:
 32062                                  	;retn
 32063                                  
 32064                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32065                                  ;
 32066                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32067                                  ;
 32068                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32069                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32070                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32071                                  ;
 32072                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32073                                  
 32074                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32075                                  get_next:
 32076 00002BF0 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32077 00002BF5 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32078                                  _get_next_:
 32079 00002BF7 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32080 00002BF9 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32081 00002BFD 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32082 00002BFE 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32083                                  	;clc
 32084                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32085                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32086                                  	; cf=0
 32087                                  	;clc
 32088 00002C00 C3                      	retn
 32089                                  gn_err:
 32090 00002C01 F9                      	stc
 32091                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32092                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32093 00002C02 C3                      	retn

 32095                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32096                                  ;
 32097                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32098                                  ;
 32099                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32100                                  
 32101                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32102                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32103                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32104                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32105                                  	; ds = cs
 32106 00002C03 E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32107 00002C06 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32108                                  
 32109                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32110                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32111                                  
 32112                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32113                                  	; ds = cs
 32114                                  
 32115 00002C08 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32116 00002C0A B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32117 00002C0C D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32118                                  
 32119 00002C0E 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32120 00002C10 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32121                                  
 32122 00002C12 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32123                                  
 32124 00002C14 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32125 00002C17 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32126                                  	
 32127 00002C19 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32128 00002C1F 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32129                                  					
 32130 00002C26 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax

 32132

 32134

 32136 00002C33 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32137 00002C39 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32138                                  					; mark as free

 32140 00002C41 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx

 32147                                  					;  data segment with the arena

 32154 00002C56 31FF                    	xor	di,di

 32189                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32190                                  ;
 32191                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32192                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32193                                  ;
 32194                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32195                                  
 32196                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32197                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32198                                  	; ds = cs
 32199 00002C77 833E[F91E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32200                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32201 00002C7C 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32202 00002C7E 06                      	push	es
 32203 00002C7F 53                      	push	bx
 32204                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32205                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32206                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32207                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32208 00002C80 8B1E[FD1E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32209 00002C84 2B1E[F91E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32210 00002C88 8E06[F91E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32211                                  	
 32212 00002C8C B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32213 00002C8F CD21                    	int	21h
 32214                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32215                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32216                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32217 00002C91 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32218 00002C93 48                      	dec	ax
 32219 00002C94 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32220 00002C96 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32221 00002C9D 5B                      	pop	bx
 32222 00002C9E 07                      	pop	es
 32223                                  su_exit:
 32224 00002C9F C3                      	retn

 32241                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32242 00002CA7 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32243                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32244 00002CA9 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32245                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32246 00002CAD 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32247 00002CB2 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32248                                  ulu_next:
 32249 00002CB7 E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32250 00002CBA 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32251 00002CBC 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32252 00002CBE 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32253 00002CC0 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32254 00002CC2 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32255                                  ulu_found:

 32257 00002CC4 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32258                                  ulu_x:

 32260 00002CCA 1F                      	pop	ds

 32263                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32264                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 32265                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32266                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32267                                  
 32268                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32269                                  ;
 32270                                  ; Summary:
 32271                                  ;
 32272                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32273                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32274                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32275                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32276                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32277                                  ;
 32278                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32279                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32280                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32281                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32282                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32283                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32284                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32285                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32286                                  ;
 32287                                  ; Example:
 32288                                  ;
 32289                                  ;   [menu]
 32290                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32291                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32292                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32293                                  ;
 32294                                  ;   [network]
 32295                                  ;   include misc
 32296                                  ;   device=foo
 32297                                  ;
 32298                                  ;   [misc]
 32299                                  ;   device=bar
 32300                                  ;   include alternate
 32301                                  ;
 32302                                  ;   [alternate]
 32303                                  ;   device=tar
 32304                                  ;
 32305                                  ;
 32306                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32307                                  ;
 32308                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32309                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32310                                  ;
 32311                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32312                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32313                                  ;   following order:
 32314                                  ;
 32315                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32316                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32317                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32318                                  ;
 32319                                  
 32320                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32321                                  
 32322                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32323                                  
 32324                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32325                                  
 32326                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32327                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32328                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32329                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32330                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32331                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 32332                                  
 32333                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32334                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32335                                  
 32336                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 32337                                  
 32338                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32339                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 32340                                  
 32341 00002CCC 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 32347                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in

 32352                                  setparms:
 32353 00002CCD 1E                      	push	ds
 32354 00002CCE 50                      	push	ax
 32355 00002CCF 53                      	push	bx
 32356 00002CD0 51                      	push	cx
 32357 00002CD1 52                      	push	dx
 32358                                  
 32359 00002CD2 0E                      	push	cs
 32360 00002CD3 1F                      	pop	ds
 32361                                  
 32362 00002CD4 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32363 00002CD6 8A1E[0F37]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 32364                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32365 00002CDA 43                      	inc	bx
 32366                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 32367                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 32368 00002CDB BA[E735]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters

 32370 00002CE0 B00D                    	mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 32371 00002CE2 B508                    	mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 32372 00002CE4 B140                    	mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 32373 00002CE6 CD21                    	int	21h
 32374

 32376                                  ;

 32379                                  ;	; 21/10/2022

 32383                                  ;	test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4

 32395 00002CF3 B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 32396 00002CF6 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax

 32399 00002CFA D2E0                    	shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 32400                                  	;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 32401 00002CFC 0806[3105]              	or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags

 32418 00002D01 59                      	pop	cx
 32419 00002D02 5B                      	pop	bx
 32420 00002D03 58                      	pop	ax

 32438                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+1],2
 32439 00002D0F C606[E835]02            	mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_3INCH720KB ; 2
 32440                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+2],0
 32441 00002D14 C706[E935]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],0

 32451                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32452                                  ;
 32453                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32454                                  ;
 32455                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32456                                  ;
 32457                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32458                                  
 32459                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32460                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32461                                  
 32462                                  parseline:
 32463                                  	push	ds
 32464                                  
 32465                                  	push	cs
 32466                                  	pop	ds
 32467                                  
 32468                                  nextswtch:
 32469                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32470                                  	je	short done_line
 32471                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32472                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32473                                  
 32474                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32475                                  
 32476                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32477                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32478                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 32479                                  	je	short getparm
 32480                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32481                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32482                                  
 32483                                  getparm:
 32484                                  	call	check_switch
 32485                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32486                                  	jc	short swterr
 32487                                  getnext:
 32488                                  	call	getchr
 32489                                  	jc	short done_line
 32490                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 32491                                  swterr:
 32492                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32493                                  
 32494                                  done_line:
 32495                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32496                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32497                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32498                                  	jnz	short okay
 32499                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32500                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32501                                  
 32502                                  okay:
 32503                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 32504                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32505                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32506                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32507                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32508                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32509                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32510                                  	; cf=0
 32511                                  	;clc
 32512                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 32513                                  exitpl:
 32514                                  	pop	ds
 32515                                  	retn
 32516                                  put_back:
 32517                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32518                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32519                                  	jmp	short done_line
 32520                                  
 32521                                  %endif
 32522                                  
 32523                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32524                                  ;
 32525                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32526                                  ;
 32527                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32528                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32529                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32530                                  ; error.
 32531                                  ;
 32532                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32533                                  
 32534                                  check_switch:
 32535 00002D22 E816FA                  	call	getchr
 32536                                  	;jc	short err_check
 32537 00002D25 724E                    	jc	short err_chk
 32538 00002D27 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 32539 00002D29 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 32540                                  	;jb	short err_check
 32541 00002D2B 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32542 00002D2D 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 32543 00002D2F 7743                    	ja	short err_check
 32544                                  
 32545 00002D31 06                      	push	es
 32546                                  
 32547 00002D32 0E                      	push	cs
 32548 00002D33 07                      	pop	es
 32549                                  
 32550 00002D34 8A0E[A437]              	mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 32551 00002D38 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 32552 00002D3A BF[A537]                	mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 32553 00002D3D F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32554                                  
 32555 00002D3F 07                      	pop	es
 32556 00002D40 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 32557                                  
 32558 00002D42 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 32559 00002D45 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 32560 00002D47 8B1E[1037]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 32561 00002D4B 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 32562 00002D4D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32563                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32564 00002D4F A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 32565                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 32566 00002D51 741E                    	jz	short done_swtch
 32567                                  
 32568 00002D53 E8E5F9                  	call	getchr
 32569 00002D56 721A                    	jc	short err_swtch
 32570                                  
 32571 00002D58 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32572 00002D5A 7516                    	jne	short err_swtch
 32573                                  
 32574 00002D5C E8DCF9                  	call	getchr
 32575 00002D5F 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 32576                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32577                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 32578                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32579                                  	; ds = cs
 32580 00002D60 C606[2A03]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 32581 00002D65 E8D803                  	call	getnum
 32582                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 32583                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32584 00002D68 C606[2A03]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 32585 00002D6D 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 32586                                  
 32587                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 32588                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 32589                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 32590                                  
 32591 00002D6E E80500                  	call	process_num
 32592                                  
 32593                                  done_swtch:
 32594                                  	;clc
 32595                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32596                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32597                                  	; cf=0
 32598                                  	;clc
 32599 00002D71 C3                      	retn
 32600                                  
 32601                                  err_swtch:
 32602 00002D72 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 32603                                  err_check:
 32604 00002D74 F9                      	stc
 32605                                  err_chk:
 32606 00002D75 C3                      	retn
 32607                                  
 32608                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32609                                  ;
 32610                                  ; procedure : process_num
 32611                                  ;
 32612                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 32613                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 32614                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 32615                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 32616                                  ;
 32617                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32618                                  
 32619                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32620                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 32621                                  process_num:
 32622 00002D76 850E[1037]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 32623 00002D7A 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 32624                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32625 00002D7C F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 32626                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 32627 00002D7F 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 32628 00002D81 A2[0F37]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 32629                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32630                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32631                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32632                                  	; cf=0
 32633 00002D84 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32634                                  try_f:
 32635                                  	; 12/12/2022

 32695                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32696                                  ;
 32697                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32698                                  ;
 32699                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32700                                  
 32701                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32702                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32703                                  parseline:
 32704                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32705                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 32706                                  
 32707                                  	;push	ds ; *
 32708                                  
 32709                                  	;push	cs ; *
 32710                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 32711                                  
 32712                                  nextswtch:
 32713 00002DA8 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32714 00002DAA 741C                    	je	short done_line
 32715 00002DAC 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32716 00002DAE 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32717                                  
 32718                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32719                                  
 32720 00002DB0 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32721 00002DB2 760F                    	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32722 00002DB4 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'
 32723 00002DB6 7402                    	je	short getparm
 32724 00002DB8 F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32725                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32726                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32727                                  swterr:
 32728 00002DB9 C3                      	retn
 32729                                  
 32730                                  getparm:
 32731 00002DBA E865FF                  	call	check_switch
 32732 00002DBD 891E[1037]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32733 00002DC1 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 32734                                  getnext:
 32735 00002DC3 E875F9                  	call	getchr
 32736                                  	;jc	short done_line
 32737                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 32738                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32739 00002DC6 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 32740                                  ;swterr:
 32741                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32742                                  
 32743                                  done_line:
 32744                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32745 00002DC8 F606[1037]08            	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32746                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32747 00002DCD 750C                    	jnz	short okay
 32748 00002DCF F9                      	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32749                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32750                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32751 00002DD0 C3                      	retn
 32752                                  
 32753                                  ;exitpl:
 32754                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32755                                  	; ds = cs
 32756                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 32757                                  	;retn
 32758                                  
 32759                                  put_back:
 32760 00002DD1 FF06[D203]              	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32761 00002DD5 FF0E[D603]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32762 00002DD9 EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 32763                                  
 32764                                  okay:
 32765 00002DDB A1[1037]                	mov	ax,[switches]
 32766 00002DDE 83E003                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32767 00002DE1 A3[E935]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32768 00002DE4 C706[0D36]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32769                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32770                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32771                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32772                                  	; cf=0
 32773                                  	;clc
 32774                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 32775                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32776                                  	;jmp	short setdeviceparameters
 32777                                  
 32778                                  %endif
