 35277                                  
 35278                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35279                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35280                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35281                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35282                                  
 35283                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35284                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35285                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35286                                  find_match:                             ;
 35287                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35288                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35289                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35290                                          inc     di                      ;
 35291                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35292                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35293                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35294                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35295                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35296                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35297                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35298                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35299                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35300                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35301                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35302                                          inc     di                      ;
 35303                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35304                                          int     21h                     ;
 35305                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35306                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35307                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35308                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35309                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35310                                  cmd_notset:
 35311                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35312                                  line_print:                             ;
 35313                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35314                                          es
 35315                                  	lodsb
 35316                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35317                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35318                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35319                                  non_null:                               ;
 35320                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35321                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35322                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35323                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35324                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35325                                  non_space:                              ;
 35326                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35327                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35328                                          int     21h                     ;
 35329                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35330                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35331                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35332                                  
 35333                                  generic_prompt:
 35334                                          call    print                   ;
 35335                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35336                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35337                                          int     16h                     ;
 35338                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35339                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35340                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35341                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35342                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35343                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35344                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35345                                  not_func:
 35346                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35347                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35348                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35349                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35350                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35351                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35352                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35353                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35354                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35355                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35356                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35357                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35358                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35359                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35360                                  
 35361                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35362                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35363                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35364                                  	clc
 35365                                  do_cmd:
 35366                                  	pop     ax			;
 35367                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35368                                  	; cf=0
 35369                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35370                                  	retn
 35371                                  
 35372                                  skip_cmd:
 35373                                  	pop     ax			;
 35374                                  skip_all:
 35375                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35376                                  	stc
 35377                                  	retn
 35378                                  
 35379                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35380                                  ;
 35381                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35382                                  ;
 35383                                  ;   INPUT
 35384                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35385                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35386                                  ;
 35387                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35388                                  ;       None
 35389                                  ;
 35390                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35391                                  ;       None
 35392                                  ;
 35393                                  ;   NOTES
 35394                                  ;       None
 35395                                  ;
 35396                                  ;   HISTORY
 35397                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35398                                  ;
 35399                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35400                                  
 35401                                  print_error:
 35402                                          push    ax
 35403                                          push    bx
 35404                                          push    cx
 35405                                          push    dx
 35406                                          push    ds
 35407                                          push    cs
 35408                                          pop     ds
 35409                                          pushf
 35410                                          call    get_linenum
 35411                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35412                                          call    error_line
 35413                                          popf
 35414                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35415                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35416                                          call    print
 35417                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35418                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35419                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35420                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35421                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35422                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35423                                  pe_1:     
 35424                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35425                                          call    print
 35426                                  pe_ret: 
 35427                                  	pop     ds
 35428                                          pop     dx
 35429                                          pop     cx
 35430                                          pop     bx
 35431                                          pop     ax
 35432                                  	retn
 35433                                  
 35434                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35435                                  
 35436                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35437                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35438                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35439                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35440                                  
 35441                                  disable_autoexec:
 35442                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35443                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35444                                  
 35445                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35446                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35447                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35448                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35449                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35450                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35451                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35452                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35453                                  dae_1:
 35454                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35455                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35456                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35457                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35458                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35459                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35460                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35461                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35462                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35463                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35464                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35465                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35466                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35467                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35468                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35469                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35470                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35471                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35472                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35473                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35474                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35475                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35476                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35477                                          retn
 35478                                  
 35479                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35480                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35481                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35482                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35483                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35484                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35485                                  	mov     dx,' Y'
 35486                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35487                                  
 35488                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35489                                  
 35490                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35491                                  
 35492                                  
 35493                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35494

 35496                                  ;
 35497                                  ; procedure : delim
 35498                                  ;
 35499                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35500                                  
 35501                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35502                                  ;
 35503                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35504                                  ;
 35505                                  ;any_delim:
 35506                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35507                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35508                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35509                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35510                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35511                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35512                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35513                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35514                                  ;
 35515                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35516                                  
 35517                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35518                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35519                                  delim:
 35520 00003086 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35521 00003088 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35522                                  
 35523 0000308A 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35524 0000308C 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35525                                  
 35526                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35527 0000308E 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35528 00003090 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35529 00003092 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35530 00003094 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35531 00003096 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35532 00003098 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35533 0000309A 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35534 0000309C 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35535 0000309E 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35536                                  
 35537                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35538                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35539                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35540                                  ;	clc
 35541                                  ;;endif
 35542                                  
 35543                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35544                                  delim_ret:
 35545 000030A0 C3                      	retn
 35546

 35556 000030A1 E897F6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 35557 000030A4 7207                    	jc	short nl_ret

 35559 000030A8 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 35560 000030AA E88EF6                  	call	getchr
 35561                                  nl_ret:
 35562 000030AD C3                      	retn

 35566                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35567                                  ;
 35568                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35569                                  
 35570                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35571                                  mapcase:
 35572 000030AE 51                      	push	cx
 35573 000030AF 56                      	push	si
 35574 000030B0 1E                      	push	ds
 35575                                  
 35576 000030B1 06                      	push	es
 35577 000030B2 1F                      	pop	ds
 35578                                  
 35579                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35580                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35581                                  ;
 35582                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35583                                  ;;else
 35584                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35585                                  ;;endif
 35586                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35587 000030B3 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35588                                  
 35589                                  convloop:
 35590 000030B5 AC                      	lodsb
 35591 000030B6 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35592 000030B8 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35593 000030BA 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35594 000030BC 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35595 000030BE 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35596 000030C0 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35597                                  noconv:
 35598                                  
 35599                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35600                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35601                                  ;;
 35602                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35603                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35604                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35605                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35606                                  ;;
 35607                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35608                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35609                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35610                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35611                                  ;check_eol:
 35612                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35613                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35614                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35615                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35616                                  ;;endif
 35617                                  	
 35618                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35619 000030C3 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35620                                  convdone:
 35621 000030C5 1F                      	pop	ds
 35622 000030C6 5E                      	pop	si
 35623 000030C7 59                      	pop	cx
 35624 000030C8 C3                      	retn
 35625                                  
 35626                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35627                                  ;
 35628                                  ; procedure : round
 35629                                  ;
 35630                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35631                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35632                                  ;
 35633                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35634                                  
 35635                                  round:
 35636 000030C9 50                      	push	ax
 35637 000030CA 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35638                                  
 35639 000030CE E8F0DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35640                                  
 35641 000030D1 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35642 000030D6 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 35643 000030DD 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 35644 000030E1 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 35645 000030E6 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 35646 000030E8 2EF606[3614]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 35647 000030EE 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 35648 000030F0 06                      	push	es
 35649 000030F1 56                      	push	si
 35650 000030F2 2E8B36[3414]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 35651 000030F7 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 35652 000030F9 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 35653 000030FB 48                      	dec	ax
 35654                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 35655 000030FC 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 35656 00003100 2E8026[3614]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 35657 00003106 5E                      	pop	si
 35658 00003107 07                      	pop	es
 35659                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 35660 00003108 58                      	pop	ax
 35661                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35662                                  	; cf = 0
 35663                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35664                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 35665 00003109 C3                      	retn
 35666                                  
 35667                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35668

 35674 0000310C BA[AB38]                	mov	dx,badmem

 35677 0000310F E87602                  	call	print
 35678 00003112 E93FD7                  	jmp	stall

 35705                                  
 35706                                  todigit:
 35707 00003138 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 35708                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 35709                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35710 0000313A 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 35711                                  	;cmp	al,9
 35712                                  	;ja	short notdig
 35713                                  	;clc
 35714                                  	;retn
 35715                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35716 0000313C 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 35717 0000313E F5                      	cmc
 35718                                  notdig:
 35719                                  	;stc
 35720                                  notdig2:

 35723                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35724                                  ;
 35725                                  ; procedure : getnum
 35726                                  ;
 35727                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 35728                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 35729                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 35730                                  ;
 35731                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35732                                  
 35733                                  getnum:
 35734 00003140 53                      	push	bx
 35735 00003141 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 35736                                  b2:
 35737 00003143 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 35738 00003146 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 35739                                  
 35740 00003148 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 35741 00003149 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 35742                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 35743                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35744 0000314A B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 35745 0000314C F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 35746 0000314E 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 35747 0000314F 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 35748 00003151 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 35749 00003154 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 35750                                  
 35751 00003156 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 35752                                  
 35753 00003157 E8E1F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 35754 0000315A 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 35755 0000315C 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 35756 0000315E 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 35757 00003160 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 35758 00003162 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 35759 00003164 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 35760 00003166 7417                    	je	short b15
 35761 00003168 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 35762 0000316D 7410                    	je	short b15
 35763 0000316F 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 35764                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 35765                                  	;nop
 35766                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35767                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35768                                  	;nop
 35769                                  	;nop
 35770 00003171 740C                    	je	short b15
 35771 00003173 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 35772 00003175 7408                    	je	short b15
 35773 00003177 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35774 00003179 7404                    	je	short b15
 35775 0000317B 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 35776 0000317D 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 35777                                  b15:
 35778 0000317F 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 35779 00003184 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 35780                                  b1:
 35781 00003189 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 35782 0000318B 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 35783 0000318D 5B                      	pop	bx
 35784 0000318E C3                      	retn
 35785                                  badnum:
 35786                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35787                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35788 0000318F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 35789                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 35790 00003191 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 35791 00003195 5B                      	pop	bx
 35792 00003196 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 35793 00003197 C3                      	retn
 35794                                  
 35795                                  ;****************************************************************************
 35796                                  
 35797                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 35798                                  
 35799                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35800                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 35801                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 35802                                  ;	si = 0
 35803                                  ;	ax = country id
 35804                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 35805                                  ;	bx = file handle
 35806                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 35807                                  ;
 35808                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 35809                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 35810                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 35811                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 35812                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35813                                  
 35814 00003198 57                      	push	di
 35815 00003199 50                      	push	ax
 35816 0000319A 52                      	push	dx
 35817                                  
 35818 0000319B 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 35819 0000319D 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 35820 0000319F B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 35821 000031A2 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 35822 000031A5 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35823                                  
 35824 000031A7 06                      	push	es
 35825 000031A8 56                      	push	si
 35826                                  
 35827 000031A9 0E                      	push	cs
 35828 000031AA 07                      	pop	es
 35829                                  
 35830 000031AB BF[CC34]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 35831 000031AE B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 35832 000031B1 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 35833                                  
 35834 000031B3 5E                      	pop	si
 35835 000031B4 07                      	pop	es
 35836 000031B5 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 35837                                  
 35838 000031B7 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 35839 000031BA 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 35840 000031BD 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 35841                                  
 35842 000031BF 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 35843 000031C0 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 35844 000031C2 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 35845 000031C5 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 35846 000031C8 E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 35847 000031CB 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35848                                  
 35849 000031CD 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 35850 000031CF 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 35851 000031D3 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 35852                                  
 35853 000031D5 46                      	inc	si
 35854 000031D6 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 35855 000031D7 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 35856 000031D8 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 35857 000031D9 5F                      	pop	di
 35858                                  
 35859                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 35860 000031DA 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 35861 000031DD 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 35862                                  
 35863 000031DF 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 35864 000031E2 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 35865 000031E4 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 35866 000031E7 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 35867                                  
 35868                                  setdoscntry_next:
 35869 000031E9 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 35870 000031EB 46                      	inc	si
 35871 000031EC 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 35872 000031ED E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find

 36079                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36080                                  
 36081                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36082                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36083                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36084                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36085                                  ;	 be moved.
 36086                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36087                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36088                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36089                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36090                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36091                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36092                                  
 36093 000032F4 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36094 000032F5 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36095 000032F8 F9                      	stc
 36096 000032F9 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36097 000032FB 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36098 000032FC 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36099                                  
 36100 000032FE 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36101 00003300 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36102 00003302 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36103 00003304 F9                      	stc
 36104 00003305 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36105                                  ricb_exit:
 36106 00003307 C3                      	retn

 36110                                  set_country_path:
 36111                                  
 36112                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36113                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36114                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 36115                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 36116                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
